title: Short Form Video Editor (Reels)
description:
About Simple Shine:



We’re an Australian window cleaning company on a mission to flip the script on the home service industry.



We believe in doing the basics the best like:



- Showing up on time

- Wearing our uniform

- Doing what we say we’ll do

- Leaving every space better than we found it



Our mission is to become a household name in the Australian home service industry.



And we believe one of the biggest levers to achieve that is having the best social media presence in the industry!



We don’t want average.

We want dominant.



The Role:



You will own the editing and repurposing of short-form content across:



- Instagram Reels

-
 Reels

- Paid Ad Creatives



Your job is simple:



Create high-performing content that:



- Stops the scroll

- Builds trust

- Generates leads

- Can be used for paid advertising



Good content is good content.

If it works organically, we can scale it with ads.



???? Core Responsibilities



- Edit 3–7 Reels per week (minimum 15–25 per month)

- Repurpose long-form footage into high-performing short clips



Add:



- Captions

- Hooks

- Fast pacing

- On-screen text

- B-roll

- Sound design



Deliver multiple hook variations for testing



???? Paid Ad Mindset



Every piece of content should:



- Have a strong first 3 seconds

- Be clear and simple

- Focus on benefits

- Be structured for conversion



We will run ads using the best-performing organic videos.



So your edits must be clean, clear, and persuasive.



???? What Success Looks Like (KPIs):



- Increasing Reel views month-on-month

- Increasing engagement rate

- Videos reused in paid ads

- Lower cost per lead from ad creatives

- Consistent posting schedule

- Low revision cycles



???? Ideal Candidate



You are:

- Obsessed with hooks

- Fast with short-form editing

- Studying Instagram trends daily

- A student of attention

- Comfortable testing and iterating

- Growth-focused, not just creative



You think:

“How do we make this better?”

Not:

“This is good enough.”



You take ownership.

Ownership Mindset is one of our core values



???? Skills Required



Strong experience editing short-form content



Proficient in:

- Adobe Premiere Pro / CapCut / DaVinci



Strong understanding of:

- Hook writing

- Retention editing

- Caption styling

- Paid ad style creatives



Good English comprehension



???? Monthly Deliverables (Baseline)



10-15 short-form videos



2-3 hook variations per key video



Basic performance tracking (what worked / what didn’t)



Ad-ready exports (correct ratios, clean formatting)



???? Compensation



Competitive Philippines full-time salary



Performance bonuses tied to:



- Output

- Growth

- Videos used in paid ads

- Lead generation impact



This role has long-term growth potential into:



- Head of Media

- Content Strategist

- Paid Creative Lead



???? Application Instructions



To apply:



Send portfolio of Reels or short-form work to 



Answer:



- What makes a Reel go viral?



- How do you structure the first 3 seconds?



- Include your expected monthly salary (part-time)



Subject line:

“Reels Operator – [Your Name]”

title: Twitter Content Strategist | Account Manager
description:
I am looking for a highly driven and extremely online individual to take full ownership of my
 account and turn it into a fast-growing, high-authority personal brand. This is not a passive scheduling role. I need someone who lives on the platform, understands how conversations move in real time, and is willing to spend multiple hours per day actively scrolling, studying trends, engaging in discussions, and positioning our account in the middle of relevant conversations.

Your core responsibility will be to grow the account aggressively and intelligently. That means posting consistently every single day, publishing high-volume content, testing formats, jumping on trends early, and building visibility through smart replies, quote tweets, and threads. You will actively comment on posts from relevant creators, founders, and industry leaders with thoughtful, knowledgeable insights that add value and attract profile clicks. The goal is to dominate attention in our niche and grow a loyal, engaged audience.

You will not operate randomly. We will work together to define core topic pillars and angles that align with my brand, business goals, and positioning. You will create a structured content plan that outlines themes, recurring formats, thread ideas, viral hooks, educational breakdowns, and contrarian takes. From there, you execute at scale. This role requires both strategy and speed. You must be able to think independently, generate original ideas daily, and adapt based on performance data.

You should deeply understand how
’s algorithm and culture work. You know how to craft hooks that stop the scroll, how to write punchy short posts, how to build high-retention threads, and how to engineer engagement loops. You understand what makes content shareable and how to create posts that spark replies, bookmarks, and reposts. You are comfortable analyzing analytics, tracking what performs, and doubling down on winning formats.

This position requires someone proactive, creative, and slightly obsessive about growth. You should enjoy spending hours inside the platform, spotting opportunities before others, and pushing content volume without losing quality. Speed matters. Consistency matters. Presence matters.

If you are someone who wants to help build a powerful personal brand, understands internet culture deeply, and is ready to treat
 growth like a serious performance game, this role is for you.

title: AUS Appointment Setter (Outbound Calls) for Fitness and Coaching Business - Day Shift
description:
We are Stronglife Health & Performance, an Australian fitness and nutrition coaching company helping men transform their health. We are expanding our remote team in the Philippines and looking for a high-performing Appointment Setters who can confidently make outbound calls to warm leads and book them for consultations.



About the role:

1. Call leads using our dialer (warm inquiries, follow-ups, and re-engagement)

2. Qualify leads and book them into scheduled appointments

3. Call booked appointments to confirm attendance when needed

4. Call leads who missed their appointments and rebook them

5. Update CRM notes accurately and in real time

6. Follow structured call frameworks (not robotic word-for-word scripts)

7. Join daily huddles and weekly coaching sessions

8. Consistently hit weekly KPIs (dials, bookings, show-up rate)

9. Coordinate closely with the General Manager and the sales team to ensure smooth handovers

10. Send daily reporting on KPI status for the day.



Before you apply, make sure you hit the following requirements:

1. ?? Minimum 4 years experience in outbound calling, appointment setting, telemarketing, or BPO sales (if you do not meet this requirement, we will not proceed with your application)??

2. Strong spoken English (clear, confident, natural)

3. Stable internet (25 Mbps or higher)

4. Laptop/PC (i5 and above, 8GB RAM minimum)

5. Noise-free work environment

6. Comfortable working with KPIs and dashboards

7. Can work AU shifts





Compensation:

First month

$8 AUD per hour (logged through hubstaff)

Incentive: Same outbound commission structure in outbound comms (contract value of sold x 3%)



Second month onwards (if met KPIs)

$10 AUD per hour

Incentive: Same outbound commission structure in outbound comms (contract value of sold x 3%)



HOW TO APPLY:

??We will not entertain applications here. Please send your entries using the google form below??



Please fill out this google form:




This application only contains 4 questions and a short voice recording requirement.

Please answer all items accurately and honestly.

title: Skill E-commerce Video Editor
description:
???? AI Video Editor Wanted – $8/hr + Performance Bonuses (Remote, Full-Time, Ecom Brand)

We're looking for a reliable, fast, and skilled AI video editor to join our growing e-commerce brand full-time.

If you're lazy, disorganized, or need your hand held — do not apply.

If you can follow directions once, deliver clean edits fast, and want to grow with a brand that's scaling hard — keep reading.



???? What You'll Be Doing:

Editing high-performing short-form AI-generated videos for
 and Instagram paid ad creatives — all in 9:16 format, keeping visuals locked in the hot zones.

Your workflow:

I provide the ad script and B-roll suggestions. You take it from there:



Generate voiceover audio matched to our avatar using Eleven Labs

Bring the audio into FAL.AI to create realistic AI video using VEO 3

Layer in B-roll (you'll have access to our existing library, VEO 3 for new clips, and stock footage sites)

Deliver a polished, scroll-stopping final cut



You're creating realistic AI videos with clean audio and visuals — not sloppy deepfakes. Quality matters.



???? ZERO TOLERANCE POLICY:

We are an established brand. We do NOT steal content from TikTok, Instagram, or any other platform. No ripping clips, no scraping other creators' content, no exceptions. If you are caught doing this, you will be instantly fired. All content is created original — through our AI tools, stock footage, or our own B-roll library.



? You Need:



Proven experience creating and editing AI-generated video content (Eleven Labs, VEO 3, or similar tools)

Past work in e-commerce or DTC brands (must show portfolio)

Strong command of editing tools (CapCut, Premiere Pro, or your preferred platform)

Understanding of 9:
 safe zones and
/Instagram ad creative best practices

Fast Wi-Fi and fast turnaround — we move quickly

Independent work ethic — after a 2-week trial period, you should need minimal management

Resourcefulness — you know how to find and create the clips you need





???? What You'll Get:



$8/hour + performance bonuses when your edits help us scale ad spend and increase ROAS

All tools and costs covered by us (Eleven Labs, FAL.AI, stock footage, etc.)

A Creative Strategist giving you clear scripts and B-roll direction — no guesswork

Constant flow of new creative work if you perform

Path to Lead Video Editor with higher pay if you show speed, skill, strong hit rate, and ability to problem-solve

Access to a paid video editing course to level up your skills (earned through performance)





???? Expectations:



Minimum 5 new videos per week

If you can produce more without a quality drop, you'll be rewarded

Full-time availability required

After the 2-week trial, you should be running independently





???? To Apply:

I don't care about your university degree. I care about what you can do. Send:



A short intro — keep it real, not generic. Tell me who you are and why you're the right fit.

Portfolio of ecom or ad-style edits only — must include AI-generated video work

Your current availability

One free test edit to show us your skill (script and access will be provided)

title: Senior Video Editor (Streetwear Brand – Advanced Colour Grading)

title: NOW HIRING: Elite Credit Repair Dispute Specialist / Team Leader| Immediate Start | Full-Time
description:
***READ FULL POST AND FOLLOW ALL INSTRUCTIONS FOR CONSIDERATION***



Do you want to work with one of the fastest-growing financial consulting firms in the U.S. credit space?



We are Limitless Financial Solutions, a top-rated company with over 300+ active clients and projected to pass 1,000+ by the end of this year. Our reputation is backed by thousands of success stories, high-level legal compliance, and unmatched client satisfaction.



We're looking for a leader — not a follower. 



Someone ready to step into a high-responsibility role, take ownership of our dispute department, and play a direct role in changing lives every single day.

This is your opportunity to become a key player in a company that’s dominating its space — with room to grow, lead, and scale alongside us.



REQUIREMENTS (This role is NOT for beginners):

You must have:

* Deep expertise in U.S. credit repair laws, including FCRA, FDCPA, CFPB & FTC compliance

* Proven track record using advanced strategies, such as:?• Metro 2 Compliance?• Opt-Out Method?• Debt Bondage Method?• FCRA § 1681i – Reinvestigation Rights?• FCRA § 1681e(b) – Accuracy of Reporting?• FDCPA § 1692g – Debt Validation Law?• GLBA § 6802(b) – Opt-Out Requirements

* Experience with LABS or other letter mailing tools

* Strong understanding of how funding approvals work (credit cards, loans, capital)

* Perfect English communication — both written and verbal

* Tech-savvy and experienced in using Client Dispute Manager (CDM) and Notion

* A natural leader — confident, vocal, and ready to guide our existing team of 3 specialists

* Organized, self-directed, and results-driven — you do NOT need hand-holding

* A strong internet connection and working video camera (non-negotiable)



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Lead and manage the entire dispute process from strategy to execution

* Train, coach, and hold your team accountable to performance standards

* Communicate directly with clients via internal chats and regular updates

* Stay ahead of industry trends and continuously optimize dispute workflows

* Collaborate cross-functionally to help clients become funding-ready

* Report directly to the owners during monthly leadership Zoom calls



WHY JOIN US?

* Stable, long-term career with a rapidly growing brand

* Leadership-level position with future promotion potential

* Make a real impact on thousands of lives by restoring financial freedom

* Be part of a top-tier company known for results, professionalism, and scale

* Enjoy remote flexibility while doing meaningful work every day



IMPORTANT — DO NOT APPLY UNLESS:

* You meet every qualification listed above

* You are a leader, not just a task-taker

* You are ready to interview and start immediately? We respect your time. Please respect ours. Only serious, qualified applicants will be considered.



TO APPLY:

1. Submit your updated resume

2. Include a short voice or video introduction about your experience

3. Use the subject line: Credit Team Leader

title: Senior Multi-Brand Graphic Designer & Video Editor (Full-Time Remote – Philippines)
description:
Senior Multi-Brand Graphic Designer & Video Editor (Full-Time Remote – Philippines)



Location: Fully remote from the Philippines (must align with Sydney/AEDT time zone: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM AEDT / 6:00 AM – 2:00 PM Manila time)

Employment Type: Full-time employee via our established Philippine partner (handles compliant payroll, taxes, SSS, PhilHealth, Pag-IBIG, and benefits)

Salary: $1,500 – $2,000 USD per month (inclusive of taxes – gross covers net after deductions)



Benefits & Perks



    All professional software subscriptions provided (full Adobe Creative Suite + AI tools as needed, e.g., Midjourney, Runway, Figma AI, etc.)

    13th-month pay (mandatory Philippine benefit)

    6-month probationary period with performance review for regular status





About the Role

We are seeking a highly skilled, senior-level graphic designer based in the Philippines to join our Australian team full-time. You will manage branding and marketing materials for 4 distinct brands, each with its own unique voice, personas, and guidelines (which you will help develop and refine).



Key Responsibilities



    Execute high-quality branding collateral: social media graphics, product data sheets, brochures, flyers, client presentation decks, artwork proofs

    Contribute to creating and evolving brand guidelines for each brand

    Make UX improvements and design suggestions for website elements

    Daily 2D CAD prep in Vectorworks: Import designs from Adobe Illustrator, adjust scaling/sizing to fit CNC machine constraints, export clean DXF files (or scripts) for production – this is a core daily task

    Weekly video editing: Short promotional clips (up to 2 minutes) using Adobe Premiere Pro; enthusiasm to integrate AI video tools (e.g., text-to-video generation, auto-editing, effects via Runway, Adobe Firefly integrations, etc.)

    HTML creation/export for responsive
 blasts (using builders like MJML, Beefree, or hand-coding as needed)





Must-Have Requirements



    5+ years professional experience as a graphic designer (at least 3 years at senior level, multi-brand or agency-style work preferred)

    Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator for vectors/branding, InDesign for layouts, Photoshop for raster/proofs, Premiere Pro for video)

    Hands-on daily experience with Vectorworks (or very similar 2D CAD) for Illustrator-to-DXF workflows: importing, precise adjustments for CNC compatibility, reliable exports

    Strong video editing in Adobe Premiere Pro for short marketing clips; eager to adopt AI video generation tools

    Experience creating HTML for
 campaigns (responsive, clean code/export)

    Proven embrace of AI tools in creative workflows (Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, Adobe Firefly, Figma AI, etc. – provide examples in your application)

    Fluent English (native-level spoken and written; comfortable in video calls and client-facing communication)

    Strong portfolio showcasing multi-brand work, marketing collateral, videos, and AI-enhanced projects

    Reliable remote setup (fast internet, quiet workspace) and self-motivated work ethic





Nice-to-Haves



    Experience with Australian or international clients / time-zone aligned remote work

    Basic motion graphics (After Effects) or other production tools





How to Apply

Please submit:



    Updated resume/CV

    Portfolio link (Behance, Dribbble, personal site) with relevant examples

    Short 1-2 minute video intro (via Loom or YouTube unlisted) answering: "Describe a recent project where you used AI in your design or video process, and why you're excited about this role."

    Confirmation you're available for Sydney hours and comfortable with early Manila starts



We review applications quickly and aim to shortlist for interviews within 1-2 weeks.



Looking forward to hearing from talented, AI-savvy designers ready to make an impact!

title: Full Time Photo & Video Editor for Real Estate Media Agency
description:
We are a growing real estate media and marketing agency looking for a full time photo and video editor to join our team long term.



This is a production focused role for someone fast, consistent, and detail oriented. You will be editing real estate photos, short form videos, and marketing content for agents, businesses, and personal brands.







Compensation Structure



This is a full time position with a target monthly earning of around $1,200, based on consistent output.



Pay is calculated per project:



Photo Editing

• $0.25 to $0.50 per photo

Rate depends on complexity and type of edit



Video Editing Rates



• Basic Trimming – $5

Simple cuts and clean up



• Entertainment Style / Highlight Edits – $8

Fast paced, engaging edits with music and strong pacing



• Talking Head Videos with Captions – $15

60 to 90 second videos with captions and clean pacing



• Longer Form Videos – $35

3 to 5 minute videos with structure, pacing, b roll, music, and polish



You will receive clear editing guides and references for each style. Editors who can handle volume efficiently and maintain quality can reach the target monthly pay.







What You’ll Be Editing



Real Estate Photo Editing

• Exposure and color correction

• Window pulls

• Sky replacements

• Basic retouching



Video Editing

• Talking head videos

• Reels and highlight videos

• Basic trims and longer form content

• Matching our brand editing style



Raw files will be delivered via Dropbox, and finished edits will be submitted through our workflow system.







Requirements



• Strong experience in photo editing

• Strong experience in video editing

• Able to follow editing guides and match style references

• Fast turnaround times

• Reliable internet for large file transfers

• Detail oriented and consistent







Nice to Have



• Real estate editing experience

• Experience editing for social media

• Familiar with Dropbox and 







How to Apply



Please include:

 1. A short intro about yourself

 2. Your photo editing portfolio

 3. Your video editing portfolio

 4. What editing software you use

 5. Your average turnaround time

 6. The word EDIT PRO in your application



We are looking for someone dependable who wants steady, long term work and can grow with our team.

title: Medical Virtual Assistant
description:
Are you a clinical professional who thrives on efficiency, precision, and autonomy? We are looking for a sharp, high-achieving Medical Assistant / Virtual Clinical Coordinator to provide mission-critical support to our medical team.



If you are a Pharmacist, RN, Med Tech, or Billing Specialist looking to transition your expertise into a dynamic virtual environment, we want to hear from you.



The Role

This isn’t your average administrative job. You will be the backbone of our clinical operations, ensuring our team has exactly what they need to provide top-tier patient care. Your responsibilities will bridge the gap between clinical knowledge and operational excellence.





Who You Are

We are looking for a specific caliber of professional. You don't just "do the job"—you master it.



Qualified: You hold experience as a Pharmacist, Registered Nurse (RN), Medical Technician, or Certified Billing Specialist.



A High Achiever: You have a track record of excellence and take pride in the quality of your work.



Independently Driven: You love the freedom of a virtual role and have the discipline to stay productive without a manager looking over your shoulder.



Detail-Obsessed: You follow complex protocols to the letter. In a clinical setting, "close enough" isn't an option.



Tech-Savvy: You are comfortable navigating EHRs, secure messaging platforms, google drive. 



Why Join Us?

100% Remote: Work from your ideal home office setup.

Collaborative Culture: You’ll be working with a team that values your expertise and relies on your input.



How to Apply

If you are a professional who loves to stride for an "A" grade and have clinical excellence, we’d love to meet you. We are only accepting application through our system link here:

title: Senior Operations & Executive Assistant

nce)

Studio Operations & Booking Management

,

nce throughout working hours

nce for all member interactions

nce actively monitored while online

Systems

nce

nce is a significant advantage.

title: Trading Chart Research & Sync Editor (Content VA) – Remote
description:
Hello — hope you’re doing well!

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



This is a long-term collaborative opportunity for editors who value consistency, creativity, and growth alongside a dedicated team.

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



We run a high-quality trading education channel and are looking for a resourceful, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant who can listen to a narrated voiceover, understand the trading concepts being explained, and find (or recreate) charts that perfectly match each segment.



This position blends chart literacy with creative problem-solving — you’ll often need to recognize what’s being discussed even when the term isn’t explicitly stated, and then source or recreate the right chart to visually communicate the concept to viewers.







________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Responsibilities

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Listen closely to the provided clip and tell the story through accurate, well-timed chart visuals.



Understand the trading term, setup, or market condition being discussed.



Locate, screenshot, or recreate high-quality trading charts that match the narration.



Add relevant effects, transitions, and annotations using Camtasia to enhance storytelling and maintain viewer engagement.



Verify each chart shows the correct instrument, timeframe, and clarity.



Organize and deliver charts in sequence for the video editor to sync.







________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Requirements

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Strong understanding of core trading concepts (support/resistance, indicators, market structure, patterns, liquidity grabs, etc.).



Ability to deduce and identify setups even when implied in narration.



Hands-on experience with Trading View or similar charting platforms.



Resourceful and precise — able to find the best visual representation, not just the easiest one.



Exceptional attention to detail, timing, and visual storytelling.





________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Platform Requirement

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Camtasia is required for the entire project.



You will be provided with all effects, transitions, and other tools needed to complete the work through our Camtasia Library package.



All work must be created, edited, and exported through Camtasia, ensuring all effects, transitions, and assets are properly embedded in the Camtasia Library Package (.libzip) format.



You may use the free version — a paid license is not required.



Ensure your system can run Camtasia smoothly and handle exporting without lag or crashes.





________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Training & Brand Style

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Full training provided on our chart color codes, formatting, and visual standards.



Access to visual templates to ensure consistency across all videos.



The goal: maintain a clean, professional, and uniform chart style that aligns with our brand identity.







________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Nice to Have

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Previous experience in trading or finance-related content creation.



Familiarity with educational or YouTube-based video production workflows.







________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Workload & Pay

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



1 video per month (8–12 minutes each)



(Includes a 1-minute clip workflow to maintain consistency and quality across projects.)



Pay Range: $70 – $150+ per video



Based on:



- Skill level



- Creativity



- Accuracy



- Execution quality



- Turnaround time



- Effort level



The link below showcases the work produced by editors on the team. All of the edits are strong, but each one reflects a different level of dedication, detail, and overall quality — and that’s exactly why we use an incentive-based system. 



The harder you work, and the more accurately and creatively you execute the story using chart visuals and our effects library, the more you earn.







________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Flexible schedule — because we view editors as partners, you’re trusted to manage your own time, work efficiently, and find the pace that suits you best while still delivering within a reasonable timeframe.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



How to Apply

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 



Include the word “RSI” at the top of your application to confirm you’ve read this description.

In your message, please share:



Your experience with trading and charting platforms.



Any examples or samples of your past trading visuals or chart work.



If you have any questions at all , don’t hesitate to ask — we value clear communication and collaboration. 



Thank you for your time.

title: Reddit Assistant
description:
We’re hiring people to manage daily activity on Reddit, including posting content and interacting within communities. This is ongoing work and requires someone who actually understands how Reddit functions, not just how to scroll it.



You’ll need atleast 3+ devices (Android only). If you own multiple devices, that’s a plus and allows you to earn more. Expect roughly one hour of work per device each day.



Each day you’ll post content across several subreddits.



A critical part of this role is reading the room. The videos we provide can range from humorous to emotional to awkward or uncomfortable. You need to instantly recognize the tone and write posts that feel natural for that type of content. If you post everything the same way, you’ll fail.



You’ll also be responsible for finding appropriate subreddits for each video. That means reviewing community rules, understanding what performs well there, and making sure your post doesn’t look forced or out of place. If you can’t do that consistently, this position isn’t for you.



We’re looking for people who think independently, adapt fast, and don’t need their hand held. Prior Reddit experience is helpful but not mandatory if you learn quickly.



This is a long-term opportunity for dependable workers. Compensation is solid and can increase based on results and how many devices you use.



Earnings:

Most contributors earn $100–$500 per month, depending on consistency and the number of devices used.



Time Commitment:

Daily time commitment ranges from about 1 to 5 hours, depending on how many devices you’re using



To apply, include:

• how many devices you can work with

• your experience using Reddit

• when you’re available each day

title: Remote Video Editor – Motorcycle Travel Documentary Series
description:
About the Project:



Last summer, I completed a 60-day motorcycle trip across Europe.

All footage has already been recorded using:

Insta360 X5

Insta360 X4

Insta360 Ace Pro 2



The content includes:



Riding sequences (POV & 360 reframed)

Scenic landscapes

Coastal roads & mountain passes

City scenes

Personal vlog commentary



The goal is to transform this footage into a cohesive cinematic travel documentary series, not just random vlog episodes.



I am planning a second trip starting June next year, and I’m looking for an editor who can:

Work on the full 60-day archive

Help structure the story

Continue working on the next trip

Commit long-term (season or annual retainer)



What I Need

This is not basic vlog editing.



I need someone who can:

Create strong storytelling flow across multiple episodes

Reframe and stabilize Insta360 footage professionally

Color grade properly (log-style cinematic look if needed)

Clean up motorcycle wind noise & helmet mic audio

Use music to build emotional pacing

Balance riding footage with scenic 
nts

Structure a long-form final piece that covers the entire journey



The final outcome should include:

Multiple episode-based videos (YouTube format)

A longer documentary-style recap video covering the entire journey



Technical Requirements

You must:

Be fluent in English (written & spoken)

Have experience editing travel or adventure content

Be comfortable working with 360° footage

Use Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar professional software

Understand cinematic pacing (not fast TikTok-style edits)

Deliver consistently and respect deadlines



Bonus if you:

Understand motorcycles or adventure travel culture

Have worked on YouTube travel channels before



Commitment Structure

This is NOT per-video freelance work.



I am looking for:

A seasonal contract (3–6 months)

or

A 1-year retainer agreement



You will:

Work on organizing the 60-day footage

Help structure episode flow

Deliver videos consistently

Continue with the next trip content starting June

Turnaround expectations:

1–2 videos per week once editing begins



Compensation

Monthly retainer (based on experience & skill level).



Please include:

Your monthly rate expectation

Your availability (hours per week)

Your editing software

3 links to your best travel or cinematic edits



Style Reference

I will share example YouTube channels that represent the tone and pacing I am aiming for.

and similar AI video platforms

title: Disposition Specialist
description:
Disposition Specialist

Finesse Cash Offer 



Full job description



Job Description:

As a Real Estate Dispositions Specialist  you’ll play a critical role in our wholesale operations by focusing on engaging buyers, negotiating deals, and ensuring a seamless closing process. Your ability to connect with VIP clients and drive revenue growth will be the cornerstone of your success.





We are a high-performance real estate wholesale company that specializes in off-market properties. Our mission is to help homeowners & land owners in distressed or time-sensitive situations sell quickly and easily. We contract directly with homeowners/ land owners and assign those contracts to investor buyers for a fee, based on the difference between our contract price and the buyer’s purchase price—known as an assignment of contract.

We operate fast, solve problems with urgency, and are obsessed with delivering results 



Why This Role?

We’re looking for a driven, energetic Disposition Specialist who loves sales, thrives on solving challenges, and is hungry to win. This is a high-impact, high-reward role where you’ll manage property sales from contract to close—connecting the right buyers to the right deals. If you're motivated by commission and want to grow in the real estate investment world, this is your opportunity.





Key Responsibilities

• Assign purchase contracts to vetted investor buyers

• Develop and grow relationships with both new and existing buyers

• Coordinate inspections, property walkthroughs, and buyer showings

• Market properties across multiple channels 
, calls, investor networks)

• Manage buyer communication from initial interest through closing

• Negotiate terms to maximize profit per deal

• Track and manage activity in our close CRM system (Podio or similar)

• Collaborate with the acquisitions and transaction teams

• Solve problems quickly to keep deals alive and moving

• Strong communication and negotiation skills.





What We're Looking For

Required:

• Real estate or investment property experience preferred

• Sales experience in fast-paced, performance-based environments

• Strong communication and negotiation skills

• Problem solver who works fast under pressure

• Highly self-motivated and accountable

• Tech-savvy with ability to use CRMs and communication tools

• Learn and master tools such as chatGPT, InvestorLyft, constant contact, Trello for note-taking, & 
 for communication. 



Preferred:

• Strong desire to build and improve internal systems

• Leadership potential and ownership mentality

• Commission-focused mindset with long-term growth vision 



Tool Requirements:

• Laptop/desktop with at least 4 GB RAM and an i3 processor.

• Stable internet connection of at least 5 MBPS.

• USB noise-canceling headset/Webcam. 



Hours: 20 hours/week 



Rate: $2 USD an hour 



Monthly cash bonuses for getting buyers for the deals we have under contract! $150 per deal closed





How to respond to application 

Send Sample Voice Recording: saying "Im calling from Properties Surplus, we have a property for sell in an area you purchased before recently? 



Include the word "Adobo" in your response. why? This lets us see who is actually paying attention.

title: Strategic Assistant & Growth Support

s). (5%)

 Ads and Google Ads opportunities

Draft/send
s as needed to leads

Tasks due in the next 7 days

Overdue tasks

Blocked items

Team workload overview

Hourly breakdowns per client 





4. Billing & Bookkeeping Support (Full Ownership)

Responsibilities:

Categorize transactions

Maintain updated books

5. Database & Storage Organization (Project-Based + Ongoing Maintenance)

Standardize file naming conventions

Archive outdated materials

Maintain order as the agency grows





6. Executive Assistant Support (Shared Ownership)

You will reduce founder administrative load.

Responsibilities:

Coordinate documents and follow-ups

Assist with contract organization





7. Client Administration (Full Ownership)

Responsibilities:

8. Content & Social Media Support (Optional Strong Plus)

Strong writing and editing ability

Zoho Projects (or similar system)

Google Workspace

QuickBooks

Upwork (preferred)

Strong organizational and systems mindset

Financial literacy

Ability to work independently

High attention to detail

Comfort working in a founder-led environment





Ideal Candidate Profile

You think in workflows and processes

You take ownership without constant direction

You stay calm under pressure

You care about presentation and tone

title: Client Success Manager
description:
We are Singapore’s fastest growing performance marketing agency seeking

Client Success Manager

(1 full-time, remote position available)



Do you love helping people win?



If yes — we want to hear from you.



???? Who We Are

We’re TRES, Singapore’s fastest-growing performance marketing agency.

We help speakers, coaches, and service-based business owners build and scale million-dollar offers through paid ads, sales funnels, and high-level mentoring.



We also run a powerful software called Intellia, and we’re looking for a Client Success Manager to help our users, mentees, and private clients get the results they came for — with world-class support and systems.



???? What You'll Be Doing

You don’t need to know everything before applying — if you have the attitude and aptitude, we’ll guide you through our proven systems, templates, and workflows.



Your role is to make sure clients win. You’ll be working closely with our internal team and clients to ensure they stay supported, engaged, and on track.



Client Success & Support

- Onboard new clients (software users, mentees, private clients) with our proven onboarding flow



- Track their progress and follow up if they’re stuck or inactive



- Support on coaching calls (note-taking, sending reminders, summarizing action steps)



- Monitor success metrics and improve retention using simple reporting tools



Event Management (Local & Overseas)

- Help us organise and coordinate live events — from sourcing venues to handling logistics



- Liaise with vendors, book venues, and manage client comms before, during, and after the event



- You don’t need prior experience — if you’re detail-oriented and resourceful, we’ll teach you



Community & Relationship Building

- Be the go-to person clients turn to when they need clarity or support



- Help manage our client groups and foster accountability, progress, and wins



- Cheer them on. Clients stay when they feel seen, supported, and celebrated



???? Requirements

You don’t need to tick all the boxes — if you’re confident you have what it takes, we want to hear from you.



? Strong English speaking is a must; English writing is a bonus

? Good with people, even better at follow-through

? Detail-oriented and able to juggle multiple tasks or clients

? Strong sense of responsibility and problem-solving

? Familiarity with tools like Google Sheets, ClickUp, or GoHighLevel is a plus

? Bonus: Event or client support experience in digital/marketing/coaching fields



???? Why Join Us?



Work remotely with a high-performing, passionate team



No time tracking. You work toward clear KPIs and results



Travel opportunities to support client events



You'll never feel like “just a support role” — you’ll be a key player in client wins



If you're ready to grow with a world-class team and make a real impact, apply now:

title: Media Buyer (Facebook/Meta, YouTube/Google Ads)
description:
We are Singapore’s fastest growing performance marketing agency seeking



Media Buyer (Direct Response | Performance-Focused)

Full-Time | Remote



About TRES



TRES is a Singapore-based performance marketing agency working with coaches, speakers, consultants, and education businesses across Asia. We specialise in direct-response campaigns — webinars, challenges, application funnels, and high-ticket offers — where real money is spent daily and performance matters.



We’re also part of a broader group that operates:

Play Bigger Mentoring (our education & mentoring brand)

Intellia (our proprietary GoHighLevel-based CRM & funnel platform)



All brands are owned and operated by the same team. This role sits fully within the TRES performance team.





Why This Role Is Different



This is not a branding or “boost post” role.



You’ll be working on:

- Real conversion campaigns

- Meaningful daily ad spend

- Funnels where decisions have real impact



You’ll follow proven SOPs — and you’ll also be trusted to make judgment calls when performance requires it.



If you want to grow fast by working close to real data, real money, and real decisions, this role will stretch you in the right way.





What You’ll Do



- Run and optimise conversion-focused paid ad campaigns (Meta primarily & YouTube next)

- Monitor campaign performance and flag issues early

- Own campaign health, not just execution

- Follow SOPs by default and make informed adjustments when needed

- Escalate performance issues and opportunities to the Ops Manager

- Participate in scheduled weekend monitoring for selected high-spend campaigns

- Join structured ad setup / implementation sessions for mentoring and Intellia launches (scheduled, SOP-led, execution-focused)



You’ll mainly receive all priorities and inputs from a single Ops Manager — no creative or stakeholder chaos.





What You Will NOT Be Responsible For

- Writing ad copy or designing creatives

- Redesigning funnels, offers, or pricing

- Handling client communication or account management

- Juggling multiple stakeholders or unclear priorities



Your focus is campaign performance and health, with clear boundaries and structure.





Who This Role Is For

This role is a good fit if you:

- Have hands-on experience running conversion ads (leads or sales)

- Are comfortable in performance-driven environments

- Stay calm, analytical, and accountable when things move fast

- Respect structure but don’t freeze when conditions change

- Communicate clearly and take ownership seriously



Who This Role Is NOT For

- “Set-and-forget” ad managers

- Freelancers juggling multiple clients

- People looking for a low-pressure, purely 9–5 role

- Anyone uncomfortable with responsibility tied to real spend





Compensation & Growth



At TRES, compensation is more than a monthly paycheck.



You’ll be operating in an ecosystem where:

- 6-figures are spent on paid ads monthly

- Multiple six figures are invested yearly into business, operations, education, health, and performance

- Decisions are made using real data, real risk, and real outcomes



What This Means for You

- Exposure to high-spend, direct-response campaigns

- Learn world-class media buying and direct response practices

- Grow beyond ads — into business thinking, systems, and personal performance

- Performance bonuses for strong execution and decision-making

- Opportunities to join yearly team retreats and overseas events held a few times a year



If you’re looking for comfort, this isn’t it.



If you’re looking to level up fast and grow properly, you’ll thrive here.



How to Apply

Please complete the application form carefully.



The questions are designed to understand how you think, not just what tools you’ve used.

???? Apply here:


 



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.



Final Note

We’re not looking for button-pushers.

We’re looking for media buyers who:

Respect structure

Protect campaign performance

Take ownership seriously

If that sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you.



???? Apply here:

title: URGENT HIRING | Data Engineer
description:
IMPORTANT: If you are interested and qualified, please submit a link to your resume AND your voice recording to 
 will only process applications of those who will send both. Applications sent through OLJ will be automatically discarded. DO NOT apply if you do not have the experience.



About the Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Engineer to design, build, and maintain our data infrastructure, with a strong emphasis on data integration, architecture, and pipeline development. The ideal candidate will have expert-level SQL and Python skills and a deep understanding of data modeling, ETL processes, and system integrations.

This role requires a strong technical foundation, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work across teams to enable data-driven decision-making. You will play a crucial role in optimizing data flows and ensuring efficient data storage, access, and processing.

This is a full-time remote position, and the candidate should be comfortable working in either the Pacific Standard Time (PST) or Eastern Standard Time (EST) timezone

Key Responsibilities

Data Integration & Pipeline Development: Design and implement scalable ETL/ELT pipelines to integrate data from multiple sources into a centralized data platform.

Data Architecture: Develop and maintain robust data models, schemas, and warehouse structures to support analytics and business intelligence needs.

SQL & Database Management: Write and optimize complex SQL queries for data transformation, extraction, and performance tuning.

Python Development: Build and maintain automation scripts, data transformation processes, and API integrations using Python.

Scalability & Performance Optimization: Ensure data systems are optimized for performance, reliability, and scalability.

Collaboration: Work closely with data analysts, data scientists, and software engineers to support data needs across the organization.

Monitoring & Debugging: Implement logging, monitoring, and alerting solutions to ensure data integrity and pipeline health.





Qualifications & Experience

5+ years of experience in data engineering, software development, or a related field.

Expert proficiency in SQL, including performance tuning, query optimization, and database management.

Expert-level Python skills, including experience with data processing libraries (e.g., Pandas, PySpark, SQLAlchemy).

Strong experience with data integration across APIs, third-party services, and internal systems.





Deep understanding of data architecture principles, including data modeling, warehouse design, and distributed systems.

Experience working with cloud-based data platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure, Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift).

Familiarity with workflow orchestration tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Prefect, Dagster).

Experience with version control (Git), CI/CD pipelines, and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.

Hands on working with ELT/ETL tools along with API based ingestion using code.





Preferred Skills

Knowledge of streaming data technologies (e.g., Kafka, Kinesis, Pub/Sub).

Familiarity with data governance, security, and compliance best practices.

 will only process applications of those who will send both. Applications sent through OLJ will be automatically discarded. DO NOT apply if you do not have the experience.

title: Quantity Surveyor – Commercial Flooring
description:
MeasureSquare M8 / CRM Experience Required



We are a fast-paced commercial flooring business seeking an experienced Quantity Surveyor to join our team.



This is a high-volume, detail-critical role. You must be able to work efficiently, accurately, and confidently under time pressure while maintaining commercial awareness.



You will be quoting directly from architectural drawings and specifications and must have a solid understanding of commercial floor and wall finishes — including installation methodology, floor preparation, and sequencing.



Key Responsibilities



Measure projects from architectural and construction drawings



Complete accurate take-offs using MeasureSquare M8 CAD



Prepare and issue structured quotations using MeasureSquare CRM



Review specifications and identify full flooring systems required



Allow correctly for floor preparation, moisture systems, trims, transitions, and wall finishes



Identify discrepancies, omissions, or risks within drawings and specifications



Communicate clearly with project managers and English-speaking clients when clarification is required



Work within deadlines in a fast-paced commercial environment



Essential Requirements



Proven experience as a Quantity Surveyor / Estimator (construction-based)



Strong experience reading architectural plans and specifications



Experience using take-off software (MeasureSquare M8 highly preferred)



Experience in commercial flooring or interior finishes



Strong knowledge of vinyl, carpet, laminate, wall linings, and floor preparation systems



Strong spoken and written English (client communication required)



Ability to work independently with minimal supervision



High attention to detail and structured working style



Important



This role requires:



Clear verbal communication with English-speaking clients



Strong comprehension skills



Accuracy under time pressure



Independent thinking and risk awareness



We are not looking for someone who simply counts square metres.



We are looking for someone who understands how flooring is installed, can anticipate issues from plans, and protects margin by identifying risks before they become problems on site.



To confirm you have read this description carefully, please include the words “M8 Flooring” at the top of your application.

title: URGENT | Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
IMPORTANT: If you are interested and qualified, please submit a link to your resume AND your voice recording to 
 will only process applications of those who will send both. Applications sent through OLJ will be automatically discarded. DO NOT apply if you do not have the experience.



Senior Full Stack Developer (Distributed Systems &

Computational Modeling)



Role Overview: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our core

engineering team building a proprietary platform for high-stakes industrial simulations and

capital project optimization. You will be responsible for developing the underlying

framework that manages complex, multi-stage computational pipelines. Your work will

focus on the seamless integration of heavy backend processing with a responsive, datarich

user experience, ensuring the reliable execution of sophisticated resource and design

optimizations.



Technical Requirements

1. Backend & Distributed Systems (Python Core):

• High-Performance Python: Advanced proficiency in Python, specifically utilizing

numerical and scientific libraries for large-scale data manipulation and algorithmic

optimization.

• Asynchronous Architecture: Extensive experience with distributed task queues

(e.g., Celery) to manage long-running, interdependent background processes and

complex workflow signatures.

• Algorithmic Implementation: Strong background in applied mathematics,

including spatial geometry, graph theory, and network flow optimization.

• Data Lifecycle Management: Expertise in managing state across distributed

systems using high-performance caching layers and persistent databases.



2. API & Real-Time Infrastructure:

• Framework Mastery: Deep experience with Python-based web frameworks (e.g.,

Django) for building robust, secure, and scalable API architectures.

• Real-Time Data Streaming: Proficiency in implementing WebSockets or similar

protocols to provide live telemetry and status updates from background engines to

the end-user.

• System Integrity: Experience designing systems that maintain strict data

consistency across multi-step, automated computational workflows.



3. Frontend & Visualization:

• Data-Intensive UIs: Ability to build sophisticated interfaces for managing complex

input parameters and visualizing multi-variable simulation outputs.

• Spatial Visualization: Experience rendering and manipulating 3D geometric entities

(vertices, faces, and polylines) within the browser to provide visual validation of

backend calculations.





Key Responsibilities:

• Bridge the gap between high-level logical planning and low-level computational

execution.

• Optimize the performance of proprietary spatial and geometric algorithms.

• Build the infrastructure that allows users to audit and interact with complex,

automated engineering decisions in real-time.

• Maintain and scale a distributed environment where background tasks must operate

with high reliability and low latency.





Preferred Qualifications:

• Degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Physics, or a related

Engineering field.

• Proven track record of building "Human-in-the-loop" systems where users interact

with complex automated processes.

• Prior experience in fields such as industrial automation, logistics, CAD software

development, or advanced manufacturing simulations.

• Familiarity with mining/energy industries is a plus.

etings (60-90 min calls chopped into 30-60 sec clips)

title: Social Media Manager & Content Operations
description:
I'm a tech/AI creator with 142K on Instagram, 280K on TikTok, and 18K on YouTube. I create short-form content about AI, robotics, and emerging technology. My top videos have over 1M. 

I handle the creative direction, scripting, and filming myself. What I need is someone to take everything I create and make sure it reaches every platform, every day, looking polished and on-brand. You're the engine that keeps the machine running while I focus on creating.



What you'll do:

Post content daily across Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and YouTube on a consistent schedule

Repurpose short-form video scripts into Instagram carousels, LinkedIn posts, and Substack/newsletter articles

Design clean, scroll-stopping carousels in Canva that match my brand aesthetic

Adapt content for each platform — write tailored captions, adjust hooks for TikTok vs IG vs LinkedIn (not just cross-posting the same thing everywhere)

Respond to comments and DMs across all platforms in my voice — build real relationships, not generic replies

Flag brand deal inquiries and collaboration requests that come through DMs

Manage and maintain the content calendar so nothing gets missed

Track performance metrics weekly — what's working, what's not, what to double down on

Stay current on platform algorithm changes, trending formats, and new features

Help grow a loyal, engaged community — not just followers, but people who actually care



You must be:

Experienced managing social media for a creator, brand, or business (show me the accounts)

Skilled in Canva — you can take a script or concept and turn it into a beautiful carousel without much direction

A strong writer who can adapt tone across platforms — casual and punchy for TikTok, professional but human for LinkedIn, engaging for Instagram

Someone who understands community building, not just posting — you know the difference between growing followers and growing fans

Familiar with scheduling tools (Later, Buffer, or similar)

Organized and consistent — if a post is supposed to go out Tuesday at 9am, it goes out Tuesday at 9am

Proactive — you spot opportunities and flag them, you don't wait to be told



Nice to have:

Experience in the tech/AI space or interest in learning it

Experience writing newsletters or Substack articles

Understanding of LinkedIn content strategy specifically

You've grown a social media account before (yours or someone else's)



Start: Immediate with 1-week paid trial

Growth potential: This role grows as the brand grows. We're scaling from 2-3 posts per week to daily content across 4+ platforms. More brand deals, more content, more platforms = more hours and higher pay for you. I want someone who's in this for the long run.



TO APPLY — You MUST complete all 3 steps. Applications that skip any step will not be considered.

1. Show me your work. Share social media accounts you've managed, carousels you've designed, or content you've repurposed across platforms. If you've grown an account, tell me where it started and where it is now.

2. The Repurpose Test. Here's a concept: "Most people think AI uses more energy than it actually does — one ChatGPT prompt uses less energy than boiling a kettle." Show me how you'd turn this into (a) an Instagram caption, (b) a LinkedIn post, and (c) describe what a 5-slide carousel would look like for this topic.

3. The Community Question. You're managing an account with 142K followers but engagement has been inconsistent. What are 3 specific things you'd do in your first two weeks to start building a more engaged, loyal community? Don't give me generic advice — be specific.

title: Short-Form Video Editor (After Effects) — AI, Instagram/TikTok
description:
JOB TITLE: Short-Form Video Editor (After Effects) — AI, Instagram/TikTok

SALARY: $1,100 USD/month

TYPE: Full-time (40 hours/week)

LOCATION: Remote (Philippines)

SCHEDULE: Async, with Vancouver overlap (PST) for feedback



---



THE MISSION



Prismiera is a luxury jewelry brand with a short-form video series already producing cinematic content on YouTube — mythology, history, goddess archetypes, and Dark Academia aesthetics.



We need someone to own the Instagram and TikTok side.



This is NOT repurposing YouTube content into different aspect ratios. This is building platform-native content that makes a woman feel powerful in under 20 seconds. You'll create original short-form edits and cinematic skits using AI-generated footage, voiceovers, and atmospheric visuals — designed from the ground up for how Instagram and TikTok audiences actually consume.



The other half of this role: you'll be working with our AI-generated personas who serve as the visual anchor across our short-form content. You'll generate, composite, integrate, and stylize AI character visuals into edits that feel striking and intentional, not gimmicky. If the idea of building a visual identity around an AI persona excites you, keep reading!



---



THE STYLE



The content mix you'll produce:



65% VIBE & SCENARIO — The kind of reel a woman sends to her group chat with no caption because the vibe speaks for itself.



25% CINEMATIC SKITS — High-end, visually stunning executions of viral formats and dark humor. The premise can be slightly unhinged or ironic, but the visuals never break luxury. Think high-end perfume commercial meets TikTok audio trend. The Goddess is never the butt of the joke — she's the punchline, and she always wins.



10% SENSORY / EXPERIMENTAL — Layered, fast, loop-optimized. Visual overload with mythological texture. The algorithmic wildcard.



YES: Aspirational. Lethal elegance. Fashion-edit energy. Dark femininity. Music-driven impact. Content that feels like a luxury car reel meets ancient mythology. Cinematic skits using our AI personas — high-production value, deadpan, surreal, or darkly ironic.



NO: CapCut presets. Generic motivational quote reels. Low-effort vlog-style acting. Slapstick comedy. Anything that looks like it was made in Canva. Anything that cheapens a demi-luxury product.



---



WHAT YOU'LL DO



Create & Adapt: Produce original Instagram/TikTok-native content using AI-generated visuals, trending audio, and our brand's mythology. Some pieces you'll build from scratch. Others you'll adapt from assets in our YouTube production pipeline. Either way, you're not resizing — you're crafting content shaped for how each platform rewards engagement.



Cinematic Skits: Build short-form skits around our AI personas that use trending formats, dark humor, or deadpan irony — executed at a visual level that never drops below luxury. People share it for the joke, follow the page for the aesthetic.



AI Persona Integration: Composite and stylize our AI-generated characters into edits as a visual anchor. She's not a narrator in your content — she's the presence. The face the eye locks onto while mythology and music layers move around her.



AI Content Generation: You won't just receive AI assets — you'll create them. Using tools like Seedance 2.0 and Seedream, you'll generate goddess visuals, atmospheric environments, and character footage that feed directly into your edits. You're both the director and the editor.



Music-Sync Editing: Your cuts, transitions, and visual reveals are married to the beat. You understand rhythm as a storytelling tool. Swells, drops, silence, impact — all intentional.



Platform Instinct: You understand what Instagram rewards vs. what TikTok rewards. You know what gets saved on IG. You know what gets looped on TikTok. You design for those behaviors, not just for visual quality.



Instagram Packaging: Beyond the Reel itself — you contribute to grid cohesion, caption strategy, and Story sequencing. The profile should make someone think "I want to be part of this" within 2 seconds of landing.



Volume at Speed: Once your templates and aesthetic are locked, your turnaround per piece should be significantly faster than building from zero. We expect high output.



---



CORE REQUIREMENTS



After Effects (Mandatory). Compositing, layering, motion graphics, light/shadow matching. This is your primary tool. You build visual experiences, not just cuts.



Premiere Pro. For project handoffs and consistency with the rest of the team.



AI Generation Fluency. This is not optional. You'll be using frontier AI tools daily — not just editing AI output, but generating it. You'll learn to prompt, iterate, select, and refine AI-generated visuals as a core part of your production workflow. We provide paid accounts for all tools (Seedance 2.0, Seedream, and whatever launches next). What we need is someone who treats these tools as creative instruments, not novelties.



The Aesthetic Eye. You instinctively know the difference between aspirational and try-hard. Between elegant and overproduced. Between powerful and loud. Your edits make people feel something before they consciously understand what they're looking at.



Music & Rhythm. You've made edits where the music drives the visuals — AMVs, fashion reels, phonk edits, fan edits, whatever. You understand pacing as a weapon. You know what "the drop" means and you know when NOT to use it.



Loop Thinking. You design edits that reward rewatching. The cut that lands on beat, the detail you only catch the second time, the seamless loop point. You think in circles, not lines.



Strong English. Daily async communication — clear, direct, professional.



Reliable & Coachable. You hit deadlines or warn early. You take direct feedback and iterate fast. You flag problems with options, not excuses.



---



BONUS SKILLS (Not Required, But We'll Notice)



- Color grading — pushing AI output and mixed footage into a consistent luxury palette

- Typography sense — text overlays that feel intentional and premium

- Sound design — SFX layering beyond just music (risers, hits, atmospheric texture)

- Carousel / static design for Instagram companion posts

- Understanding of Instagram analytics — saves, shares, completion rates, and what drives them

- Experience building visual identities for brands or personas on social media



---



WEEKLY OUTPUT



Ramp-up (first 2–3 weeks): 3–5 pieces as you learn the brand aesthetic, lock your AE templates, learn the AI generation tools, and calibrate with the team.



Steady state: 10–15 pieces per week across Instagram and TikTok — a mix of original productions and asset-based adaptations depending on the content calendar.



---



HOW THIS ROLE FITS



Other editors handle cinematic YouTube production and visual effects — you own social media. Same mythology, same brand, different platform behavior. Each editor has a distinct lane, and yours is how Prismiera looks and feels on Instagram and TikTok.



---



SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS



RAM: 16GB minimum (32GB preferred) + SSD

Reliable high-speed internet (upload speed matters)

Must run After Effects, Premiere Pro, and browser-based AI tools simultaneously



---



PAID TRIAL (Shortlisted Candidates)



Before any full-time commitment, we run a weekly paid trial. We provide real assets from our production pipeline, style references, and the AI persona visuals. You deliver content. Trial is compensated at $250 USD at the end of each week. If it's a mutual fit after 30 days, we transition to regular bi-weekly payments (before work).



This protects both sides — you see whether the work fits your strengths, we see whether the output fits our brand.



---



WHAT WE OFFER



- Paid accounts for all frontier AI tools — Seedance 2.0, Seedream, and whatever launches next

- Creative ownership — you're defining how a luxury brand looks and feels on Instagram and TikTok from day one

- An AI persona to build around — not a hypothetical, an active visual identity you'll shape and evolve

- A role that evolves as the tools evolve — this job will look different in six months, and that's the point

- Clear briefs — asset libraries, mood references, and specific direction for every batch

- Direct feedback — specific, constructive notes on every edit

- A brand worth building — Prismiera launches soon. A second AI-native brand is incubating behind it. You're not joining a finished machine. You're helping build one.



---



COMPENSATION



$1,100 USD/month. Paid trial at $250 USD/week, transitioning to bi-weekly payments of $550 (before work) after 30 days.



---



OWNERSHIP & CONFIDENTIALITY



All outputs (edits, project files, prompts, generated assets, persona visuals) are Prismiera property and must remain confidential.



---



HOW TO APPLY



Do not send a generic cover letter.

Use 7 apply points or more when applying.



Subject line: PRISMIERA SOCIAL — [Your Name]



Send the following (in this order):



1. The Vibe Test. Link to ONE edit you've made that is aspirational, aesthetic, or fashion-adjacent — or a skit that demonstrates platform-native virality instinct. Format doesn't matter. The feeling does.



2. The Rhythm Test. Link to ONE edit where the music drives the visuals. Show us your beat-sync instinct. (Can overlap with #1 if one video demonstrates both.)



3. The Creative Instinct Test (3–5 sentences total). You're given a 45-second cinematic video about a queen who poisoned her entire court, a folder of our AI Goddess visuals, and a dark atmospheric beat. Pitch two reworks: (A) a 15-second Instagram Reel designed to get saved — tell us your audio choice, pacing, and what the first 2 seconds look like; and (B) a 15-second cinematic skit that uses dark or deadpan humor without losing the luxury feel.



4. AI Experience (1–2 sentences). What is your experience level with generative AI tools? If none, say so — we'll evaluate the rest on its own merits.



5. Hardware. Your PC specs: CPU / GPU / RAM. Plus your internet upload speed.



6. Turnaround Estimate. Given existing footage, a music track, and an established AE template — how long would a 15–20 second piece take you?



7. The Rewrite. Rewrite this sentence to sound dark, powerful, and aspirational: "She is really cool and strong and she wins."

title: Virtual medical administrative assistant
description:
Virtual Medical Administrative Assistant – Pain Management/Neurology (USA)



Job Type:



Full-Time

Remote (Supporting U.S.-Based NeurologyPain Management Practice)



Position Overview:



We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Medical Administrative Assistant to support a busy U.S.-based Neurology/Pain Management practice. The ideal candidate has prior experience in U.S. healthcare administration, understands medical terminology, and is comfortable working with insurance verification, prior authorizations, chart preparation, and patient scheduling.



This role requires excellent communication skills in english, HIPAA compliance awareness, and the ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently in a fast-paced medical environment.



Key Responsibilities:



Administrative Support

 • Manage patient scheduling and appointment confirmations

 • Handle inbound and outbound patient calls professionally

 • Maintain accurate patient records in the EMR/EHR system

 • Coordinate referrals and follow-ups



Insurance & Billing Support

 • Verify patient insurance eligibility and benefits

 • Obtain prior authorizations for procedures and medications and imaging

 • Submit and track referrals and authorizations and results 

 • Assist with claims follow-up and basic billing inquiries



Pain Management-Specific Tasks

 • Coordinate procedure scheduling (e.g., injections, nerve blocks)

 • Confirm imaging and diagnostic reports are received

 • Manage medication refill requests in accordance with provider guidelines

 • Track compliance documents (pain contracts, consent forms)



Documentation & Compliance

 • Ensure HIPAA-compliant handling of patient data

 • Upload and organize medical documents

 • Maintain accurate and up-to-date patient files



Qualifications:

 • Minimum 1–2 years experience in U.S. healthcare os required 

 • Experience in Pain Management, Neurology Orthopedics, or Specialty Clinics is a plus

 • Familiarity with EMR/EHR systems (eClinicalWorks is essential)

 • Knowledge of CPT, ICD-10 codes (basic understanding preferred)

 • Strong English communication skills (verbal and written)

 • High attention to detail and strong organizational skills

 • Ability to work during U.S. business hours



Technical Requirements:

 • Reliable high-speed internet connection

 • Noise-canceling headset

 • Quiet home office setup

 • Secure computer with updated antivirus software



Key Competencies:

 • Professional phone etiquette

 • Multitasking and time management

 • Problem-solving skills

 • Confidentiality and integrity

 • Team collaboration



 Required:

 • Experience with prior authorizations for pain procedures, medications, imaging

 • Familiarity with U.S. Medicare and commercial insurance policies

 • Medical billing or coding certification

title: Part-Time UGC Video Editor (META Ads)
description:
We’re an emerging healthy food brand scaling quickly in e-commerce and paid media, and we’re looking for a highly reliable, detail-oriented UGC Video Editor with experience creating high-converting META ads.



This role will primarily focus on UGC-style performance ads, though some projects may include mixed creative styles (storytelling, educational, and light brand-forward edits).



You’ll work closely with our Creative Strategist and Senior Video Editor to produce engaging, performance-driven ads at scale. This is ideal for someone who understands direct response marketing and can move quickly without sacrificing quality.



We move quite fast paced, but we do not cut corners.



This role starts part-time. Hours may vary initially but can grow over time, with the opportunity to become full-time for the right person.



Compensation is based on experience.



What You’ll Do:

Edit high-performing video ads for META 
 & Instagram)



Focus primarily on:

UGC-style ads

Direct response and hook-driven creatives



Occasionally edit:

Storytelling & educational content



Lifestyle & brand-forward creatives



Light animation (bonus)



Produce approximately listed goal of videos per week (depending on hours/workload)



Most ads are 30–90 seconds (under 2 minutes)



Follow creative briefs and scripts precisely



Ensure every visual aligns with the script and message (no mismatched scenes)



Collaborate weekly with the creative team to review performance and iterate



Maintain strong pacing, hooks, and clarity throughout each edit



Deliver work that requires minimal revisions



Quality Standards (Extremely Important)



We care deeply about attention to detail. Before submitting work, you are expected to double- or triple-check everything.



This includes:



Correct spelling and captions (no typos from the script)



Clean cuts and transitions



Proper pacing and scroll-stopping hooks



Background music properly leveled or muted when needed



Correct clip selection that matches the script’s message



Proper video length (no extra black frames or export errors)



Simple, easily catchable mistakes should not make it to review.



While occasional mistakes happen, repeated careless errors are not acceptable.



Speed matters, but rushing at the expense of quality is not okay.



Work Style & Expectations



Part-time role to start (hours may vary week to week)



Opportunity to grow into full-time



Must overlap with U.S. work hours (EST) for communication 

For example:

M - F 3AM-11AM, so there is an overlap between us for communication.



Must be able to follow direction carefully and execute feedback fully



Must complete all requested revisions in one pass (not partial fixes)



Must be organized and comfortable working in a structured workflow



You will be overseen by a Senior Video Editor and Creative Strategist. Performance and attention to detail are closely reviewed.



Tools & Experience

Required



Strong experience editing high-converting META ads



Proven UGC editing experience (hooks, captions, pacing, retention-driven cuts)



Proficiency in:



Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut Pro, InShot, and/or Canva



Strong understanding of direct response creative



Organized, reliable, and detail-oriented



Experience in fast-paced agency or performance-driven environments



Bonus (Not Required):



Experience with VEO, AI tools, or animation



Familiarity with
 Ads Manager, Motion, Atria 



Slack for daily communication



ClickUp for task management



We provide tools such as Storyblocks



You’ll collaborate with:



Founder



Performance team



Creative Strategist



Senior Video Editor



What We’re Looking For:



Strong work ethic



High attention to detail



Performance marketing mindset



Agency-level speed + precision



Adaptable and coachable



Takes pride in delivering clean, thoughtful work



Someone who genuinely cares about quality and consistency



How to Apply



Please reply with:



Your portfolio (UGC and performance ads preferred)



Prior experience working with agencies and/or brands



Any experience with performance-driven or paid social content



Your availability (weekly hours)



Your expected hourly rate



We’re excited to add someone who values quality, accountability, and craft as much as we do.



Thank you! We look forward to hearing from you!
