title: Part-time Digital Content/SEO Specialist
description:
We are seeking a freelance Digital Marketing Specialist to support our execution team on a contract basis. This role focuses on content implementation, SEO optimization, and technical management of client assets.







Your Key Responsibilities



As a core member of our execution team, you will handle a diverse range of tasks designed to drive client growth.



Content Writing: Produce SEO-optimized blog posts, articles, and website copy aligned with client requirements.

SEO Execution: Perform keyword research and optimize on-page elements, including meta titles, descriptions, and headers.

Backlink Strategy: Research backlink opportunities, draft guest blog proposals, and create articles for link-building purposes.

WordPress Management: Upload, format, and publish content directly via client WordPress backends.

Google Ads Support: Assist in the setup, monitoring, and optimization of Google Search Ad campaigns.

Reporting: Track and report on key performance metrics, including content engagement and keyword rankings.





What We Need From You



Proven Experience: Minimum 1-2 years of hands-on experience in content writing, SEO, or digital marketing.

CMS Proficiency: Strong familiarity with WordPress is essential. You should be comfortable navigating the backend and formatting posts.

SEO Knowledge: A solid understanding of on-page SEO best practices and keyword research tools.

Google Ads Experience: Familiarity with Google Search Ads is a strong plus.

Excellent Communication: Native or near-native English writing skills with impeccable grammar and attention to detail. Cantonese proficiency is a bonus.

Self-Starter Mentality: Ability to work independently, manage your own time effectively, and meet strict deadlines without constant supervision.

title: Email  Marketing Specialist
description:
We’re Hiring: Cold
 outreach Specialist



We’re not looking for someone who “knows how to send
s.”



We’re looking for someone who understands cold
 as a revenue engine.



If you’ve built real outbound systems, scaled inboxes, protected deliverability, and generated replies that convert — keep reading.



???? What You’ll Actually Be Responsible For



This is not a copy-paste VA role.



You will:



* Build cold
 systems from zero (domains, DNS, SPF, DKIM, DMARC, tracking, routing)

* Set up and scale multi-inbox infrastructure for mass outreach

* Warm and manage inboxes properly (not fake metrics — real deliverability)

* Launch and manage campaigns inside tools like Instantly, Smartlead, Lemlist, etc.

* Write or improve high-converting cold
 sequences

* A/B test angles, hooks, subject lines, and CTAs

* Monitor reply rates, bounce rates, domain health, and continuously optimize

* Protect sender reputation while scaling volume



If you’ve never built backend infrastructure yourself — this role isn’t for you.



???? What We’re Looking For



* Hands-on experience scaling cold
 campaigns

* Deep understanding of deliverability (SPF, DKIM, DMARC, inbox rotation, spam triggers)

* Strong copy instincts — short, clear, response-driven writing

* Analytical mindset — you track numbers, not vibes

* Ability to troubleshoot issues fast (Google Postmaster, blocklists, etc.)

* Ownership mentality — you don’t wait to be told what to fix



???? Who This Is NOT For



* People who only “manage campaigns” but never built infrastructure

* People who rely fully on warm-up tools without understanding why

* People who think 1% reply rate is acceptable

* Anyone who needs hand-holding



???? What Success Looks Like



* Stable inbox health

* Scalable sending systems

* High-quality reply rates

* Continuous optimization



If you’re confident you can build and scale outbound the right way — apply.

title: Entry-Level Healthcare Virtual Assistant (full/part-time)
description:
APPLICATION PROCESS:

1
 us your resume in PDF format only. Include all of the jobs you've worked at and the month + year. Do not leave anything off. Do not leave anything off.  You must provide an explanation of any gaps in your work history. Include the compensation you received for each job. Do not give us your hourly pay, only your annual compensation or total compensation.  If there is any gap in your resume without an explanation of the gap, you will be disqualified.



2.
 us a 60-second video of yourself answering the following question:

What are the 3 most important things that the company you work for MUST do to show you that they care about you? For example, if they don’t give me these 3 things then that means they don’t care about me. The video CANNOT EXCEED 60 seconds, or you will automatically be disqualified.



3. IMPORTANT: Please
 us at 
 to follow the above instructions will result in automatic disqualifications.  Do not DM us or call us or contact us in any other way.



ABOUT OUR COMPANY:

Achieve Integrative Health is the #1 rated Acupuncture & Wellness Clinic in the United States with over 750 five star google reviews. Our Mission is to help people restore their body’s God given ability to heal itself so that they can do what they love. Our vision is to equip and inspire one million people around the world to do what they love, when they want, with whom they want. 



WHY JOIN US?

• You’ll Achieve your Goals = our team provides all of the resources (information, training, opportunities) you’ll need to achieve all of your Professional, Financial and Personal Goals, as long as you are willing to put in the work and deliver results.



• Peace and Joy Team = we have a phenomenal culture of care for our patients and our tea
mbers. We are very strict with our rules, policies and core values in order to protect our culture of peace and joy.  Imagine being on a team where you don’t have to deal with people who talk behind your back and end up back stabbing you.



• Be Highly Rewarded as a Side Benefit = imagine being able to do your Passion everyday and make a phenomenal living as a side benefit. The average "experienced" VAs in the Philippines/Indonesia make $5-$7 USD/hr, our entry-level VAs start off making $5/hr. We have a quarterly bonus program, where some of our tea
mbers have earned $500-$1,000USD per quarter, and this year 2025, because the team has performed so well, some tea
mbers were paid an 'additional' year end bonus of $2000-$3000 USD.



BENEFITS

• Competitive Total Compensation = $5-$12 USD/hr for graveyard shift only.

• Unlimited Opportunities for Growth = as long as you can generate more results for the company we will never limit your ability to grow within our company. Every tea
mber can also become a partner of the business if they desire.

• Other Benefits for qualified tea
mbers = paid-time off, premiu
dical insurance, Employee Savings Matching Program

• Work from Home = no more 2-4 hour commutes to work

• Wellness Initiatives = benefit from complimentary virtual health services from our medical providers, ensuring your well-being and your family’s well-being is always a priority.



JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

• Receive all inbound calls to close Leads wanting to receive treatments at our clinic

• Call,
, and use various communication forms to identify the validity and potential of the lead

• Receive all inbound calls to answer questions – fact find and qualify lead/route to appropriate tea
mbers

• Work with patients to ensure they are satisfied with the services provided

• Encourage happy patients to send us their success stories

• Share patient success stories during daily company meeting

• Implement our CARE system to follow-up with our patients to provide 5 star service

• Check-in and checkout patients

• Verify Insurance Benefits

• Other additional tasks may be added based on your strengths…



CHARACTER REQUIREMENTS & QUALIFICATIONS

• You must truly have a caring heart and truly want to help people improve their health, if you are mainly focused on how much money you can make, we are not the team for you

• You must speak Fluent English (ie. someone on the phone can understand what you're saying w/o straining)

• You must be organized and be able to handle multiple tasks and responsibilities everyday. If you’re looking to only do one or two tasks per day, we are the wrong team for you.

• You must be able to follow instructions exactly as written, if you don’t like reading or following instructions, we are not the right team for you

• You must have a good heart. If you like to gossip behind peoples back, please don’t apply.

• You must value Results over effort. If you like to be paid based on how many tasks you completed or how much responsibilities you have, we are not the team for you. We pay ONLY based on you meeting your KPIs, metrics, quotas.

• You must sleep the same schedule 7 days a week, as this is a graveyard shift, you cannot switch back to the Philippines/Indonesian time zone on the weekends as this destroys your health. Your Health is our priority, and if you don’t value your own health we don’t want you on our team.

• You must be honest and have integrity. If you are caught lying, you will be immediately terminated.

• You must want to EARN your pay (ie. base salary + bonuses) instead of being given a pay (ie. focused only on base salary) that you didn’t earn.

* we are not looking for experience, we prefer candidates who have no medical VA experience, as having experience hinders your success on our team.  We are looking for character, who you are as a person.



WORKSTATION REQUIREMENTS

• You must have a separate quiet room to work in. You can not have your children or anybody else in the room that you work as your screen will be displaying confidential information, no exceptions.

• There can not be any background noise in your room when you are making phone calls.

• You will be required to provide photos of your workspace

• We will also randomly ask you to show your workspace via your webcam, and if you are caught lying you will be fired immediately.



COMPUTER AND INTERNET REQUIREMENTS:

• Fast and reliable wired internet connection of not less than 100 Mbps

• Secondary and Tertiary Back up Internet of not less than 10 Mbps

• At least one Power Station Backup

• Dual Monitor

• Intel Core i3 or higher Operating System with at least 8gb RAM

• Excellent quality headset with microphone, and a working webcam



WORK SCHEDULE:

title: Ai video editor
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce company looking for a talented and disciplined video editor to produce high-performing ad videos. IMPORTANT: All work is done in Spanish (Spain and Mexico markets).

Main Mission

Your role will be to edit videos optimized for Meta Ads and TikTok Ads, following strict briefs and processes. Work by batches: 1 batch = same video with 3 different hooks. Minimum volume: 5 batches/week (15 videos).

Required Skills

    •    Proven experience in video editing for e-commerce, dropshipping, or Meta/TikTok ads.

    •    Proficiency in CapCut, Premiere Pro, or After Effects.

    •    Mastery of AI tools: HeyGen (avatars, lipsync, AI videos) and OpenArt (images, backgrounds).

    •    Knowledge of hooks (0-3s), scroll-stoppers, ad pacing, and conversion-focused structures.

    •    Up-to-date with current trends: fast cuts, text overlays, pattern interrupts, UGC formats.

Mandatory Tools

    •    HeyGen (avatars, lipsync, AI videos).

    •    OpenArt (images, backgrounds).

    •    Drive, Notion, Frame.io for collaboration.

Conditions

    •    Part-time: Minimum 5 batches/week.

    •    Rate: 29 USD per batch (1 batch = same video with 3 different hooks).

    •    Remote, long-term if performance is excellent.

    •    Internal communication in English (operational English required); production in Spanish.

Application Process (mandatory)

    1.    Send your portfolio with e-commerce/ads examples.

    2.    Confirm your volume (5 batches/week) and AI tools mastery.

    3.    Test: Mini-batch with 3 hooks from a provided script (deliver 3 videos).

Only profiles with e-commerce experience and successful test will be considered. No improvisation—focus on fast execution and feedback.

description:

 the above two items to

mber can also become a partner of the business if they desire.

title: Virtual Assistant for Entrepreneur and Content Creator
description:
Hi! 

My name is Priscila, originally from Brazil and living in the US. I spent 20 years at Procter & Gamble and left recently to build my own businesses. I’m now growing a personal brand on LinkedIn, running consulting projects, building a coaching practice, and organizing a TEDx event.



Things are moving fast. But I’m doing too much myself, and the things I’m doing manually are things that someone with real experience could do faster and better.



You can learn more about me here: 
/in/priscila-pree-silva



YOUR ROLE



The work has three elements to it:

• Content and design — creating LinkedIn carousels, infographics, lead magnets, and other visual content in Canva or Figma. Scheduling, repurposing, and helping grow my presence on LinkedIn.

• Operations and project management —
 marketing, SOPs, project tracking, keeping tools and systems organized. You keep things from falling apart so I can focus on clients and content.

• Personal support — calendar, travel, family coordination, reminders.

As the business grows, the role will evolve. I need someone who’s excited by that, not threatened by it.



AI PROFICIENCY IS ESSENTIAL

I use AI daily. I expect you to use AI tools as a multiplier in everything you do.

• When I ask you to research 20 podcast hosts, you don’t spend 8 hours Googling. You use AI to build an initial list in 30 minutes, then spend your time verifying it.

• When you draft a message, you use AI to generate options, then apply your judgment to pick and refine the best one.

• When we need a new SOP, you use AI to draft the framework, then refine it based on reality.



AI handles the 60% that’s mechanical. You handle the 40% that requires judgment, creativity, taste, and human connection. Together we operate like a team of 5.



What Makes This Role Different

I’m not looking for someone who waits for instructions. I’m looking for someone who:

• Brings expertise I don’t have. You’ve supported creators or entrepreneurs before. You see me about to make a mistake you’ve seen before and you say something.

• Gets things in order. I’m a builder who understands the value of structure. I am trying to grow my ventures right and need someone that ensures there is structure with the 
ntum.

• Gives honest feedback. If you have a better idea, tell me.

• Thinks like a partner. I want someone who grows with the business, takes on more responsibility over time, and has real input into how we work.

• Helps build the team. As the business continues to grow, I’ll look to you to help identify and bring on additional support. If you know great people, even better.



KEY AND ESSENTIAL SKILLS

• Excellent written English communication skills

• Very strong attention to detail

• Positive 'can do' attitude and willingness to take on tasks and learn new things

• Willing to work hard and want to grow professionally

• Proficiency with AI tools

• LinkedIn knowledge, you understand the platform and the culture

• Proactive communication, you flag problems early and push back respectfully



PAY 

• $
/month full-time (40 hrs/week) depending on experience and skills

• Open to taking on 2 part-time tea
mbers instead if your skills are excellent in a specific area



PERKS

• You control your own time as long as you have a few hours around 7:30AM EST-9:00AM EST. 

• Flexible time off. If you need time off just let me know 2 weeks in advance.



APPLYING FOR THE JOB

Send me an
 to 

Subject: Virtual Assistant - [Your Name]

Include:

1. Short intro (3-5 sentences): Why would you like this position and why are you a good fit for it. 

2. AI tool experience: Which tools, how often, one concrete example of how AI made your work better.

3. Design samples: Portfolio link or 2–3 examples of social media content you’ve created.

4. Availability and expected monthly rate.

5. What software and tools do you use (for
, creative work, research and AI)



Please include your CV and creative portfolio. 



I am looking for a tea
mber for the long term and will offer raises and bonus’ based on performance as we grow the company and you progress. Therefore I will only look at applicants that really want the role.



If you are invited to the interview stage, there will be a written and creative task that will be paid. If successful at this stage, there will be a short video call between us and video and spoken English will be required. 



Thank you for reading the application. 



Pree

I’m hiring one experienced caller to speak directly with apartment building owners.

This is NOT motivated seller hunting.

You will be speaking with long-term property owners about:



• Valuation timing

• Refinancing pressure

• Hold vs sell strategy

• Loan maturity awareness



If your background is wholesaling, distressed sellers, or price-driven calling — this role is not for you.



What You Will Do



• Call apartment building owners

You will NOT:



? pitch offers

? discuss prices

? negotiate

? chase motivation

? act as acquisition agent



Requirements

• Calm, professional English

Bonus if you’ve booked valuation or strategy calls before.

???? Pay



$5/hour to start

Performance bonuses for qualified owners + booked calls

? Do NOT apply if:



• You’ve done wholesaling

• You chase distressed sellers

• You talk about “right offer”

• You ask for asking price

• You use residential language (“house”)

To Apply (MANDATORY)



Reply with:



Voice recording answering:



“Hi — is this the owner of the apartment property on Maple Street?

Written answer:



Owner says: “I’m not selling.”

How do you respond if your goal is to book a valuation call?



Applications without both are ignored.

Andrew

title: Junior Business Analyst (Paid Internship ? Business Analyst I Promotion Track)
description:
Company: Quantum Arcadia Group

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Employment Type: Full-Time

Salary: ?10,000–?15,000/month (Probation) | ?25,000–?40,000/month upon Promotion



About Quantum Arcadia Group



Quantum Arcadia Group is a Private Equity & Geopolitics Firm operating across Europe, Asia, North America, and Oceania (Australia).



The firm is structured into seven specialized teams, each composed of 8–14 professionals operating under strict performance, accountability, and execution standards.



You are applying to join the firm’s newest team.



This team is led by our Principal Strategist, who holds full operational authority, including unilateral discretion to hire, discipline, or terminate personnel at any time based on performance, conduct, or business necessity.



Role Overview



We are hiring Junior Business Analysts, structured initially as a Paid Intern / Junior BA role for 3–6 months, with strong intention to promote qualified individuals to Business Analyst I thereafter.



This role is designed for serious, high-potential graduates seeking structured professional growth in a disciplined environment.



Compensation & Benefits



During 90-Day Probation:



?10,000–?15,000 monthly



Bi-weekly salary payments



Performance-based bonus eligibility



Upon Promotion to Business Analyst I:



?25,000–?40,000 monthly (based on performance and contribution)



Salary + performance-based bonuses



Paid holidays



Birthday leave (double pay)



Fully remote



Standard working hours



Compensation within the firm is performance-driven. Employees who demonstrate exceptional reliability, execution, and value creation may see compensation increases ranging from approximately 30% to as much as 150%, based solely on merit and business impact. Compensation growth is earned — never guaranteed.



Probation & Standards



All new hires are subject to an immediate 90-day probationary period.



During probation:



Flawless adherence to expectations is required



Any tardiness, unapproved absence, call-outs, or no-shows may result in immediate termination without notice



Performance is continuously evaluated



This is a professional, high-accountability environment. Reliability and discipline are non-negotiable.



Security & Information Access



Certain areas of the firm are intentionally restricted for operational and security reasons. Access to systems, departments, or information is granted strictly on a need-to-know basis.



Lack of visibility should not be interpreted as an error. It is standard operating procedure.

title: Senior Technical Consultant & Delivery Analyst  (Product • Program • Support) - Consulting Experience Preferred
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE



I am hiring ONE exceptional Senior Technical Analyst who can handle all research, documentation, workflow mapping, requirements, meeting prep, governance artifacts, backend support and analysis behind the scenes.



You will operate as my consulting engine so I can focus on leading meetings, presenting, and driving strategy.



This is a high-skill, consulting-level role l.



You must be able to understand concepts, program governance, requirements, enterprise workflows, and technical documentation.



RESPONSIBILITIES



Program Management Support

Summarize meeting recordings into decisions, risks, actions

Help structure program governance documents

Track deliverables across global regions

Research capabilities, configuration patterns, and data models

Compare vendor features and prepare analysis decks

Executive Support & Documentation

Organize notes, documents, status updates, and deliverables

Write polished documents using AI tools

REQUIRED EXPERIENCE (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

, Whimsical)

title: FRACTIONAL CFO & ECOM DATA ANALYST (REMOTE)
description:
THE MISSION



You are the financial architect of the brand.



Your role is to ensure every dollar spent on Meta, TikTok, inventory, or 3PL logistics is accounted for, optimized, and producing a return. You will provide the financial “pulse” that allows leadership to scale aggressively with clarity and confidence.



Our goal is to maintain 100% financial transparency, protect a 35–40% Contribution Margin, and position the company for a $15M+ valuation.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Daily & Monthly P&L Management



• Build and maintain a daily financial P&L (Net Revenue, COGS, Ad Spend, Contribution Margin)

• Monitor financial performance and identify margin fluctuations

• Detect and report money leaks (software waste, team inefficiencies, shipping overages)



3PL Audit & Logistics Analysis



• Weekly reconciliation of 3PL invoices vs Shopify raw data

• Identify billing errors, hidden fees, or overcharges

• Analyze shipping zones, weight classes, and fulfillment costs to protect margins



Inventory Forecasting & Cost Analysis



• Create 30 / 90 / 180-day forecasts aligned with growth and creative launch velocity

• Manage and optimize Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC)

• Support planning for large inventory runs: deposits, reorder timing, and cash allocation



Tax & Compliance (AU & US)



• Prepare and submit Australian BAS statements

• Assist with annual tax strategy and compliance (AU + US Sales Tax / Nexus)

• Ensure financial accuracy and audit readiness



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



• 3+ years experience working with 8-figure DTC / e-commerce brands

• Advanced proficiency in:

    Xero

    Shopify (Advanced Reporting)

    Google Sheets / Excel (financial modeling & dashboards)

• Strong analytical mindset — able to turn numbers into insights and recommendations

• Experience working with founders and scaling brands preferred



SAMPLE WEEKLY FLOW



Morning: Input Meta/TikTok spend + Shopify sales into Daily P&L

Tuesday: Audit 3PL fulfillment report vs Shopify order IDs

Friday: Present cash flow forecast highlighting upcoming inventory deposits

Quarterly: BAS preparation + US Sales Tax reconciliation



WHY JOIN BEAUTY SLEEP CLUB



• Fast-growing DTC brand with aggressive scaling roadmap

• Work directly with founders and leadership

• High ownership, strategic impact, and growth opportunity

• Flexible remote setup with long-term potential



HOW TO APPLY



Please include:

A short intro about your e-commerce finance experience

Tools you have mastered (Xero, Shopify reporting, forecasting, etc.)

Example of a financial dashboard or forecast you’ve built (screenshot or Loom preferred)



IMPORTANT: Start your application with the phrase “Financial Clarity Drives Growth” so we know you read the full post.

title: Operations and Execution Coordinator
description:
HIRING: Operations & Execution Coordinator (Virtual Assistant)

Operations & Finance Coordinator (Remote)



PLEASE NOTE - There are screening questions that must be answered, we will not contact you if the questions are not answered.



We’re a fast-growing luxury fashion & uniform company serving hospitality, wellness, and resort clients. We run lean and are looking for a highly organized Operations & Finance Coordinator to manage our QuickBooks, HubSpot deal flow, and daily operational follow-through. PLEASE NOTE: There are screening questions at the bottom, questions must be answered to be considered. Please make sure your replies are no longer than 3 sentences for each question.



This role is for someone who loves systems, details, and closing loops. Your job is to keep our financial communication, CRM pipeline, and vendor costs accurate and up to date so leadership can focus on growth. Our founder needs help staying on top of all details and client requests. This will be your chance to really help a growing business!



Need to have experience with the following: Hubspot or Zoho, Quickbooks, Shopify, Google Drive.



Key Responsibilities

Finance & QuickBooks 

• Manage daily activity in QuickBooks (invoices, payments, reconciliation support)

• Monitor and respond to the accounting
 inbox, answering client and vendor questions professionally

• Track outstanding invoices and follow up on payments to 5 star clients, must be excellent in communicating

• Maintain clean, accurate financial records and flag discrepancies quickly



HubSpot CRM (Primary)

• Understand our business flow and work with CEO to create a deal flow in Hubspot that works for our business

Own and maintain HubSpot deal flow from Lead, Proposal,  Verbal, Closed, Production

• Clean up pipelines, update deal stages, and ensure data accuracy

• Identify missing information and follow up with the team to keep deals current

• Provide weekly pipeline summaries and status updates

Create client intake forms and contracts in hubspot



Operations & Vendor Support

• Place fabric and materials POs with approved vendors

• Track costs in detail by project and flag budget changes

• Monitor samples, timelines, and production status

• Maintain organized trackers in Google Drive/Sheets



What We’re Looking For

• Strong QuickBooks experience (required)

• Hands-on HubSpot pipeline management experience (required)

• Excellent written English and professional
 communication (required)

• Extremely organized and detail-oriented

• Comfortable owning follow-ups without reminders

• Able to manage multiple projects independently

• Experience with purchasing, vendor coordination, or cost tracking is a plus

• Experience in fashion, manufacturing, or hospitality is a bonus



Details

• Part-time (20–25 hours/week to start)

• Fully remote

• Growth opportunity as the company scales



If you’re someone who brings structure, accuracy, and ownership to operations and finance, we’d love to hear from you.



Required Screening Questions (Must Answer)

1) If a client is 60 days late on payment, please provide an example of what you would say via
 to collect payment.



HubSpot

1a. Pipeline Design (Strategy)

Our business sells B2B custom uniforms with a sales cycle that moves from inquiry to production.

If you were setting up our HubSpot from scratch, what deal stages would you create and why?

(Please list the stages and briefly explain your logic.)



1b. What questions would you ask to understand our deal flow?





2. Cleanup & Data Integrity (Execution)

You open a HubSpot account and find:

600 deals

Many duplicates

Missing close dates and deal values

Deals stuck in the wrong stages

What exact steps would you take to clean and organize the pipeline?



3. Ownership & Ongoing Management (Operations Thinking)

How do you ensure HubSpot stays accurate over time?

What rules, workflows, or habits would you implement so deals don’t become outdated or messy again?

Operations



7. Do you have experience placing purchase orders with vendors and tracking costs by project? Please describe.



8. On a scale of 1–10, how comfortable are you managing multiple projects and follow-ups independently?



9. The founder works with many clients, each project has different timelines and deliverables. How will you help the founder stay organized and ensure all tasks get completed?

title: Pitch Deck & Slides Specialist – On Demand
description:
ABOUT US

We’re a U.S.-based creative studio working with brands and creators. We build client-facing deliverables constantly (proposals, pitch decks, timelines, strategy decks, product decks). We move fast and our decks must look clean, premium, and boardroom-ready.



We need a reliable slides specialist who can produce decks on demand with fast turnaround and high attention to detail.



ROLE OVERVIEW:



You’ll take rough inputs (notes, docs, Looms, bullets, screenshots) and turn them into polished presentations that look like they came from a top agency.

This is a production role: layout, structure, clarity, visual hierarchy, consistency, speed.



RESPONSIBILITIES

Build decks in Google Slides + PowerPoint (must be strong in at least one, ideally both, or something comparable)

Turn rough content into clear slide structure (headlines, flow, hierarchy)

Create clean layouts using grids, spacing, typography, alignment

Improve slides with charts/tables/diagrams (simple + clear)

Maintain consistent styles (fonts, colors, spacing, icons)

Deliver fast iterations based on feedback

Keep a library of reusable slide components/templates for speed

Occasionally source icons/images (must understand licensing/usage basics)



WHAT “GOOD” LOOKS LIKE

Decks that are clean, modern, minimal, and premium

Sharp headline writing and slide flow (you can simplify clutter)

Fast turnaround: 6–15 slides inside 48 hours when needed

Zero sloppy alignment issues, inconsistent font sizes, or messy spacing



REQUIREMENTS (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

Proven portfolio with presentations / decks (not just graphic design)

Strong taste: typography, spacing, layout

Fluent written English (you will edit headlines and tighten copy)

Organized file management + version control

Can handle tight deadlines and revisions without drama



BONUS POINTS

Experience with pitch decks, proposals, strategy decks, timelines

Familiar with brand systems (using an existing style guide)

Can build simple diagrams (process flows, timelines, org charts)

Basic knowledge of Figma (helpful, not required)



TOOLS

Google Slides, PowerPoint, (optional: Figma / Illustrator), Google Drive, Slack



WORK TYPE / HOURS

Part-time, on-demand (flexible)

Typical workload: 5–20 hours/week depending on client flow

Must be responsive and able to take rush requests when needed



COMPENSATION

Flat Fee per Deck - deck price negotiated prior to project start. 



$3–$9/hour (depending on skill + speed)



HOW TO APPLY:



Send:

Your portfolio with deck examples (links only)

Your typical turnaround time for a 10-slide deck

Confirm which tools you use (Google Slides / PPT / Figma)

title: Senior US Tax Accountant
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE APPLYING. This role is open only for candidates who has experience in US Taxation.



Job Description





Role Title: Senior US Tax Accountant

Shift: 07:00 AM - 03:30 PM PST

Salary: $1,700







Overview:



We are seeking a highly experienced Senior US Tax Accountant with strong hands-on expertise in U.S. federal and multi-state taxation, including extensive experience with Schedule E, pass-through entities, and real estate taxation. This role will be responsible for preparing and reviewing complex tax returns, handling advanced tax compliance and planning, and serving as a technical resource for clients and internal teams.







Key Responsibilities:



Prepare and review U.S. federal and state tax returns including:

Individuals (Form 1040)

Corporations (Forms 1120, 1120S)

Partnerships (Form 1065)

Trusts and Estates (Form 1041)

Prepare and review Schedule E for:





-Rental real estate income and expenses



-Depreciation and cost segregation



-Passive activity loss limitations



-K-1 income from partnerships and S-corporations



-Basis, at-risk, and passive loss carryforwards



-Handle multi-state filings and allocations for pass-through entities.



-Prepare tax provisions, estimates, extensions, and quarterly filings.



-Perform tax research and provide technical guidance on complex issues.



-Review fixed assets, depreciation schedules, and amortization.



-Support IRS and state audits, notices, and correspondence.



-Provide tax planning strategies to minimize liabilities.



-Communicate directly with clients regarding tax matters and compliance.







Qualifications:



Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance (Master’s in Tax preferred).

CPA or EA strongly preferred.

5+ years of U.S. public accounting experience in taxation.

Strong expertise in Schedule E, rental real estate, partnerships, and S-corps.

Advanced knowledge of U.S. federal and state tax law.

Proficiency with tax software such as UltraTax, ProSystem fx, Lacerte, CCH Axcess, or similar.

Experience with multi-state and multi-entity structures.

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple deadlines.

Preferred Experience:



U.S. CPA firm or large accounting firm background.

Real estate, investment, and high-net-worth individual tax clients.

Review and leadership experience managing junior staff.

Ability to work U.S. business hours and collaborate with U.S. teams.

title: Finance Director
description:
Role Title: Finance Director

Salary: $5,000/m





Job Overview:





We are seeking a strategic, results-driven Chief Financial Officer (CFO) to lead the financial operations of a high-growth, multi-entity investment and asset management firm. This executive will serve as a key member of the leadership team, responsible for driving financial strategy, ensuring compliance, optimizing performance, and enabling data-informed decision-making at the highest level.



The ideal candidate will have deep experience in financial planning and analysis, multi-entity and fund accounting, and real estate or private equity environments. Proficiency in NetSuite is required. You will be hands-on and detail-oriented while also contributing to long-term planning and financial leadership. This is an exciting opportunity to make a lasting impact in a fast-paced, innovative, and mission-driven organization.







Key Responsibilities:



Lead and oversee all financial functions, including accounting, FP&A, budgeting, reporting, audit, and compliance

Own monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reporting for leadership and stakeholders

Direct financial planning and cash flow forecasting across multiple entities and investment vehicles

Ensure timely, accurate month-end close, reconciliations, and internal controls

Partner closely with executive leadership on long-term financial strategy, fundraising, and capital planning

Oversee and continuously improve systems, processes, and automation to increase financial efficiency and insight

Coordinate with external auditors, legal, and tax professionals to maintain compliance with all regulatory requirements

Manage and mentor the finance team, fostering a high-performance and detail-oriented culture

Support due diligence, investor reporting, and fund performance analysis

Optimize the use of NetSuite and other systems to streamline reporting and decision-making





Qualifications:



- CPA or equivalent financial certification preferred

- Minimum of 5 years of experience in progressively senior finance roles, with at least 3 years in a CFO or VP of Finance capacity

- Strong experience in fund or real estate accounting, private equity, or asset management

- Proficiency in NetSuite is required

- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, Google Workspace, and CRM platforms such as HubSpot or Salesforce

- Proven track record in financial forecasting, budgeting, and strategic planning

- Exceptional analytical, organizational, and leadership skills

- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities

- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment with competing priorities

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
Salon Marketing Solutions is an Australian-based marketing education company supporting beauty salons, skin clinics, and aesthetic businesses across Australia and New Zealand. We provide done-for-you campaigns, strategic mentoring, and practical tools to help clinic owners grow consistently and confidently.



Please ONLY apply if you have experience in the ff:
 Marketing, Meta Ads, Canva Pro, Meta Business Suite 



Recruited and Trained by Vanessa McDonald Consulting – Installed™ Service

Installed™ builds in-house marketing capability for beauty and skin clinics.

This role is a 4–6 week training and placement pathway, preparing you to run the full social media marketing function inside a clinic — not as an agency, but as an embedded tea
mber.



Purpose: 



To lead and execute a clinic’s social media marketing strategy, design, content, engagement, and paid ads — with the goal of growing visibility, followers, and lead lists. You will be placed with a growing clinic business (to be advised at the second interview) and work directly with the clinic owner following installation.

 marketing will be required on an ad-hoc basis to complement social strategy.

This is an incredible opportunity to learn directly from Vanessa McDonald — one of Australia’s most respected marketing strategists in the professional beauty and skincare industry, with 24 years of experience guiding clinics to build sustainable, high-performing marketing systems.



You’ll be trained in:



The beauty, skin, and aesthetics industry — treatments, terminology, and client psychology.

The specific clinic’s business, brand, and product range.

 marketing systems used within the industry, including Phorest or Shortcuts (training provided for these only if the clinic you are placed with uses these particular platforms).



Core Responsibilities: 



- Develop and implement Instagram and
 strategies that drive engagement, growth, and qualified new client leads.

- Manage Meta Ads end-to-end: strategy, creative, setup, optimisation, and reporting.

- Confidently operate within the Meta Business Suite and Ads Manager, keeping up to date with current Meta tools and best practices.

- Design high-quality, on-brand content in Canva Pro, following the clinic’s brand style guide.

- Create and edit reels and short-form videos using apps such as CapCut or similar.

- Write fluent, polished UK English captions and campaign copy that reflect the clinic’s tone of voice.

- Manage DMs and engagement daily — responding to enquiries, nurturing prospective clients, and connecting with local influencers and aligned businesses for collaboration opportunities.

- Build and send
 campaigns using Mailchimp or the clinic’s in-house marketing system (Mailchimp expertise is essential).

- Utilise AI tools to enhance efficiency while preserving human judgment and creative quality.

- Prepare concise monthly reports covering organic performance, ads, and
 activity.

- Once Installed, you’ll work directly with the clinic owner using a clear communication and project management system that sets expectations, deadlines, and approvals.



Required Experience & Skills



- Minimum 3 years’ proven experience in social media strategy and Meta Ads management.

- Demonstrated results in organic audience growth and engagement.

- Strong proficiency with Meta Business Suite, Ads Manager, data analysis, and reporting.

- Advanced Canva Pro design capability with excellent attention to detail. We’re seeking candidates who can create clean, professional artwork and design aligned to brand standards.

- Confident in photo editing and basic retouching to ensure all visual content is polished, consistent, and on-brand.

- Skilled in reel creation and short-form video editing (CapCut preferred).

- Expert in Mailchimp, including automation, segmentation, and reporting.

- Adaptable to other industry platforms such as Phorest or Shortcuts (training provided for these systems only).

- Familiar with ManyChat or similar tools for automated lead capture.

- Excellent written and spoken UK English for an Australian audience (10/10 fluency).

- Reliable, responsive, and professional in remote settings.

- Must successfully complete a test task before onboarding.



Work Structure & Conditions

Part-time: 20 hours per week (remote, flexible)

Training rate: $175 AUD/week (4–6 weeks)

Probation (3 months): $200 AUD/week

Post-probation: $220 AUD/week

After 12 months: $250 AUD/week

Performance bonuses apply for meeting or exceeding campaign KPIs and results benchmarks.

If you prefer full-time work, you may be placed with two clinics instead of one.

All recruitment, training, and placement are managed through Vanessa McDonald Consulting – Installed™.



To maintain quality and focus:

You cannot work with other beauty or skin clinics in Australia or New Zealand.

You may retain a small number of freelance clients outside this industry, provided your total weekly workload remains under 50 hours.

You’ll have full ownership of strategy ? design ? captions ? scheduling ? reporting, supported by structured systems, brand training, and direct client collaboration.



Hiring Process



Application review: We assess your cover letter, résumé, and portfolio for relevance and quality.

Initial interview: A video interview with our recruitment specialist to discuss experience, fit, and expectations.

Test task: You’ll complete a short assignment to demonstrate your ability in design, content creation, and social strategy.

Final interview: Successful applicants are invited to a second interview with Vanessa McDonald.

Presentation matters — please ensure a professional appearance, a stable internet and audio connection, and a tidy background during interviews.



Fill out this form to apply:

title: Lead Social & Community Growth Manager
description:
About the Role



We’re hiring a senior, hands-on Social & Community Growth Manager to own and scale our organic presence across YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn — with strong working knowledge of how adjacent platforms 
, Threads, X/Twitter, Bluesky, Reddit) support discovery, conversation, and community.



This is not a VA role and not an assistant position.



We’re looking for someone who has actually run social growth for a brand, creator, podcast, or media property — someone who understands platform nuance, community dynamics, and how to turn content into repeatable growth systems.



You’ll work closely with our founder and video editor to repurpose long-form podcast episodes into high-performing short-form content, manage community engagement, and continuously evolve strategy as platforms change.



What You’ll Own



End-to-end organic social strategy and publishing calendar

Repurposing long-form podcast content into Shorts, Reels, TikToks, carousels, and platform-native formats

Writing and optimizing all captions and copy by platform

Managing community engagement (comments, replies, participation)

Monitoring performance and running A/B tests (hooks, formats, captions, timing)

Tracking trends, competitor activity, and breakout content patterns

Proactively bringing ideas based on insight, data, and experimentation

Light exposure to paid amplification (organic-first mindset required)



How We Work



This role is for someone who stays sharp and evolves.



We expect you to:



Stay current on platform and algorithm changes

Learn from competitors and adjacent creators

Identify what’s working and adapt it intelligently for our brand

Use AI tools to move faster — without outsourcing judgment or strategy



We provide AI-powered workflows to accelerate research, ideation, and optimization.

This is not an AI-operator role — we’re hiring a thinking partner who uses tools thoughtfully.



Who This Role Is (and Isn’t) For



This role is for you if:

You’ve managed and grown social accounts professionally

You understand that each platform behaves differently

You think in terms of hooks, retention, engagement, and iteration

You’re comfortable owning outcomes, not just executing tasks



This role is not a fit if:

You’re primarily a personal social media user

You’re a general VA or admin who “also does social”

You rely only on templates or reposting

You’re looking for a side gig or moonlighting role



Tools We Use

Canva, CapCut

Metricool, Buffer

Google Drive, Slack

Native editors (TikTok, IG Reels, YouTube Shorts)

AI tools to support ideation, analysis, and optimization



Our Hiring Process



We want to be respectful of your time and make sure this role is a strong mutual fit.



Our process is:

Application review

Shortlist of candidates

A short follow-up screening question (async)

A paid, time-boxed test focused on how you think, not free work

Final conversation and decision



The paid test is designed to understand your strategic thinking, platform judgment, and approach to growth — not to assess execution speed or design polish.



How to Apply



Please include:



A short note or resume highlighting specific results (growth, reach, engagement)

Links to accounts you’ve managed or examples of content you’ve created

A brief outline of how you’d turn one podcast episode into 5–7 posts across different platforms (and why)



Important:

To confirm you’ve read the full posting, please include the phrase

“Organic > Ego”

at the top of your application or subject line.

title: Flexible Reddit Task (Charts Posting)
description:
We’re looking for a few people to help post high-quality charts and data to different Reddit communities.



What you’ll do:

1. Post our charts to 3 different subreddits per day

2. Each post must be in a different subreddit

3. No repeating the same subreddit for at least 30 days



Important:

1. No career or job-related subreddits

2. Subreddits must have at least 10,000 weekly visitors

3. You must have good judgment on which communities fit each chart



Note:

1. Audience is US-based

2. Image posting only. No long writing needed

3. We will provide the charts and tracking sheet.



Time required:

1. About 10 to 15 minutes per day

2. Fully flexible schedule



Requirements:

1. Experience using Reddit

2. Good understanding of what performs well on Reddit

3. Careful and responsible posting behavior

4. Must be able to avoid spam and bans



Pay:

PHP 1,500 for 100 posts



To apply, please include:

1. How long you’ve been using Reddit

2. Link to the Reddit account you will use

3. Choose 3 non-career subreddits where you would post this chart and explain why each is a good fit


/p/work-from-home-preference-trends

4. For each subreddit, write the post title you would use



This is a small, flexible task, not a full-time job.

title: Appointment Setter — AI Agency $150 Commission Per Sale · Work From Home
description:
Most VA sales jobs pay you a flat rate whether you book 2 demos or 20. This one doesn't. You earn $150 every time a deal closes from a demo you booked. Book 4 demos a week, close 2 that's $300 that week. Do that consistently and you're looking at $1,200–$1,500 a month from this role alone. The ceiling is yours to set.



What You'll Be Doing

We sell an AI-powered lead recovery system to MedSpas across the US. When a clinic misses a call after-hours, our AI answers, books the patient, and captures the lead. Your job is to call clinic owners and practice managers, find the ones who are frustrated with missed calls, and book them onto a 15-minute demo with our closer.



You will call from a provided script three different tracks depending on the lead. You will log every call in our CRM (GoHighLevel). You will book the demo while they're still on the phone. That's it. No pitching the full product. No chasing after demos. Book it and move to the next call.



If you are not willing to record a Loom video to apply, this role is not for you. If you have never made outbound calls and are not willing to be trained on a specific script, this role is not for you. We move fast and don't negotiate on these.



How to Apply

01

Record a 60–90 second Loom video. Say your name, your outbound sales experience, and read this line out loud: "Hi, this is [your name] calling from the South Tampa AI Agency, do you have 90 seconds?" We need to hear your voice and check your audio.

02

Send your Loom link with your application. No Loom = no review. We will not ask you for it after the fact.

03

If your Loom passes, you will receive a short script test within 48 hours. Complete it and the role is yours to start.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
I’m launching a new YouTube channel and am looking for a talented graphic designer to help build the visual brand from the ground up.

Right now, I’m focused specifically on branding and design — not video editing. This project is about creating a strong, cohesive visual identity that I can use across all platforms before I begin hiring for video production.

Your main responsibilities will include:

Designing a logo

Developing a cohesive color scheme

Creating a YouTube banner and channel branding assets

Designing profile images and header graphics for platforms like YouTube and X 
)

Creating a thumbnail style template that is clear, bold, and optimized for YouTube

I want all visuals to feel consistent and professional across platforms. The goal is to establish a clear brand identity that can grow with the channel.

This will begin as a project-based gig. However, if we work well together, I expect to need additional design support in the future as the channel expands. I’m open to building an ongoing working relationship with the right person.

Strong communication is important. I’m looking for someone who is open to feedback, can share creative ideas, and is comfortable discussing concepts before finalizing designs.

To be considered, you must include:

A portfolio with relevant examples (logos, branding, YouTube banners, thumbnails, etc.)

Your hourly rate

Applications without work samples will not be considered.

I’m excited to collaborate with someone who can help shape this brand from the very beginning.

title: Social Media Manager (Multi-Brand, Growth-Focused)
description:
We are hiring a Social Media Manager to handle and grow 5 brands across:



LinkedIn

Instagram

TikTok

Pinterest

YouTube

Other platforms as needed (must be a fast learner)



This is a structured, performance-based role. Posting and engagement must follow strict schedules and analytics tracking.



Time Zone & Availability (Non-Negotiable)



Must be available to post and engage in Los Angeles (PST)

Core activity window: 11:00 AM – 8:00 PM PST

Posting and engagement times vary by brand and must be followed exactly



Tools (Experience = Priority)



ManyChat

Metricool

Meta Business Suite

TikTok Business

YouTube Studio

Pinterest Business



Responsibilities



Schedule and manage content across all platforms

Engage with audiences at specific scheduled times

Manage automations and DM flows (ManyChat)

Track analytics and performance (Metricool)

Maintain brand voice and visual consistency for 5 brands



Attend weekly strategy meetings to:

   • Review analytics

   • Research trends

   • Improve growth

   • Stay ahead of platform and algorithm changes



Creative Growth Expectation



You will be expected to:

Engage with audience

Edit videos and photos to each brand’s aesthetic 

Create and optimize Reels, TikToks, Shorts, Pins, and thumbnails

Continuously improve visual quality and storytelling

Actively research social trends and viral formats (Think in growth, not just posting)



Probation & Pay Structure (Read Carefully)



3-Week Probation Period

Performance evaluation phase

* **No payment is issued until probation is successfully completed**

Starting pay after passing probation: $100



Pay increases based on:



  • Performance

  • Consistency

  • Growth results

  • Skill development

  • Opportunity to move into **performance-based pay**



You Are a Fit If:



You can manage multiple brands without losing quality

You follow schedules precisely

You are organized, proactive, and trend-aware

You respect time zones and posting windows

You want long-term growth, not quick gigs



This role is simple in task, but high in standards.

We are building brands, not filling feeds.

title: Office Administrative/Accounting Tech

s

title: Transaction Coordinator for Real Estate
description:
**MUST APPLY THROUGH THE LINK BELOW. WE WILL NOT CONSIDER YOU IF YOU APPLY VIA onlinejobs.ph**





We are seeking a highly experienced Real Estate Transaction Coordinator to support a small team of four licensed agents who are consistent high producers. This is a busy, performance-driven environment where strong coordination and accuracy directly impact the team’s success.



This role is heavily focused on contract-to-close transaction management. We are specifically looking for candidates with 3 to 10+ years of real estate transaction coordination experience who understand contracts, compliance, deadlines, and the full lifecycle of a transaction. You must be confident handling multiple files at once and communicating directly with agents, escrow officers, lenders, buyers, and sellers.



Knowledge of Texas contracts is a strong plus, but not required. This is not an entry-level position. We need a seasoned coordinator who can step in, take ownership of files, and operate with minimal supervision in a high-volume setting.



**MUST APPLY THROUGH THE LINK BELOW. WE WILL NOT CONSIDER YOU IF YOU APPLY VIA onlinejobs.ph**

title: Salesforce Developer
description: We are seeking a developer who is an expert in Salesforce and has the ability to integrate various applications across our company. We are a scaling construction company that wants to streamline our process by leveraging technology.

title: AI Product Image & Shopify Listing Specialist (Fashion E-commerce)
description:
We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented tea
mber to help improve and optimise our product images for our fashion e-commerce store. This role focuses on creating high-quality AI-generated product visuals and enhancing product listings to increase conversions.



This is flexible and relaxed work, but it requires a strong eye for detail and a good understanding of fashion presentation.



What you will do:



You will work on improving product images using AI tools such as Higgsfield and other relevant platforms. You must be comfortable creating and refining prompts to generate high-converting product images, including model images and clean studio product shots.



You should understand what customers want to see before making a purchase. For example, if a product needs an extra angle, better framing, or a different presentation to improve buying confidence, you should be able to recognise that and implement it.



You will also work inside Shopify to help optimise product listings and image presentation.



- Requirements:

- Experience with AI image generation tools (especially Higgsfield or similar platforms)

- Strong understanding of writing effective prompts for product visuals

- Experience working with Shopify product listings

- Good understanding of fashion and what makes products visually appealing

- Ability to think commercially and improve images to increase conversions

- Reliable, trustworthy and consistent

- Flexible and able to start immediately



Working Hours:



You must be available to work from 2:00 AM Netherlands time (CET)

This is 9:00 AM Philippine time (PHT)

The shift will be approximately 5 hours per day.



Compensation:



Hourly rate: $2.50 per hour



This is steady and simple work, but we are looking for someone with a strong eye for detail and a genuine understanding of fashion presentation and customer psychology.



Before hiring, you will complete a small paid test task to demonstrate your skills and attention to detail.



If you believe you are creative, commercially aware, and comfortable working with AI image tools and Shopify, we would love to hear from you.



Please apply with examples of your previous work and briefly explain your experience with AI-generated product images.

title: Senior B2C Sales Appointment Setter (US)
description:
Role Overview:



We are seeking a proactive Appointment Setter to join our team. You will be the first point of contact for prospective law firm clients, helping schedule discovery calls and appointments with our team. Your work will directly support our mission of helping law firms hire better and operate more effectively.



Key Responsibilities:



Contact leads via phone,
, and social media to schedule appointments for our consulting team.

Qualify leads to ensure they align with our ideal client profile.

Maintain accurate records of all outreach and appointments in our CRM.

Follow up with prospects to confir
etings and keep them engaged.

Collaborate with the sales and client success teams to optimize lead generation strategies.

Provide regular reporting on outreach activity and appointment results.

Requirements:



Previous experience in appointment setting, sales outreach, or lead generation (B2B experience preferred).

Strong communication skills in English (Spanish or Portuguese a plus depending on target market).

Comfortable using CRM tools and online communication platforms (Zoom, HubSpot, Pipedrive, etc.).

Highly organized, self-motivated, and results-driven.

Ability to work flexible hours to accommodate U.S. time zones.

Persistent, positive, and professional in engaging with prospects.

Preferred Qualifications:



Experience working remotely for U.S.-based clients.

Familiarity with the legal or professional services industry.

title: Public Relations (PR) Manager – Full-Time/Remote
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled and proactive Public Relations (PR) Manager to lead our firm’s media, publicity, and brand visibility efforts. This role is essential in strengthening our reputation, securing media opportunities, and supporting our attorneys and leadership team with interviews, speaking engagements, and public-facing initiatives. Candidates with experience in legal PR or professional services are strongly preferred.



Key Responsibilities:

Media & Thought Leadership

Identify and secure opportunities for podcasts, webinars, interviews, and speaking engagements

Prepare talking points, briefing documents, and professional bios

Build and maintain relationships with podcast hosts, journalists, and event organizers

Conference & Event Coordination

Research and recommend industry conferences and speaking opportunities

Handle logistics: registrations, booth materials, schedules, and coordination

Work with designers to create handouts, brochures, and branded marketing materials

Press & Publicity

Draft and distribute press releases for events, milestones, and announcements

Maintain press and media lists, track placements, and monitor PR activity

Serve as the primary contact for media inquiries

Testimonial Collection & Promotion

Collect written and video testimonials across all brands

Coordinate with the content team to edit and publish testimonials

Ensure all testimonials comply with legal marketing and ethical guidelines



Qualifications:



Bachelor’s degree in PR, Communications, Marketing, or a related field

3–5 years of PR experience (law firm or professional services experience is a plus)

Strong writing, editing, and media communication skills

Excellent organizational and project management abilities

Comfortable working directly with attorneys, executives, and media contacts

Familiarity with PR tools, press release platforms, and analytics/reporting

Knowledge of legal industry marketing standards is a plus



What We Offer:



Competitive salary + performance bonuses

Supportive and mission-driven team culture

Professional growth and development opportunities

Access to events, conferences, and networking platforms



Interested in Applying?

Please complete the application form:

??

title: PR Manager
description:
Position Summary



We are seeking an experienced and proactive Public Relations (PR) Manager to lead our firm's media and public relations efforts. This role plays a key part in enhancing brand reputation, increasing public visibility, and supporting our attorneys and leadership team with speaking, press, and media opportunities. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in PR strategy, event coordination, and media outreach—ideally within a legal or professional services environment.



Key Responsibilities



Media & Thought Leadership



Source and secure high-impact opportunities for podcasts, webinars, speaking engagements, and interviews



Prepare briefing documents, talking points, and bios for firm representatives

Maintain and grow relationships with podcast hosts, media contacts, and event organizers

Conference & Event Participation



Identify relevant industry conferences and speaking opportunities

Coordinate logistics for firm participation, including registration, booth materials, and scheduling

Collaborate with graphic designers to develop and print handouts, pamphlets, and branded materials

Press & Publicity



Write, coordinate, and distribute press releases for firm milestones, events, and campaigns

Maintain media lists and track PR placements

Act as a point of contact for press inquiries and media opportunities

Testimonial Collection & Promotion



Collect written and video testimonials from clients across all brands

Collaborate with the content team to ensure testimonials are edited and published appropriately

Ensure all testimonials adhere to legal marketing guidelines and ethical standards

Qualifications



Bachelor's degree in Public Relations, Communications, Marketing, or a related field

3–5 years of public relations experience, preferably in a law firm or professional services environment

Strong writing and editing skills for press materials, pitches, and media correspondence

Excellent organizational and project management abilities

Confidence in communicating with attorneys, leadership, and media professionals

Experience with PR software, press release distribution tools, and basic analytics/reporting platforms

Familiarity with ethical marketing standards, especially in the legal industry, is a plus

What We Offer



Competitive salary and performance bonuses

A collaborative, mission-driven work environment

Opportunities for professional development and career growth

Access to industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities



Job Type: Full-time

title: Finance & Property Operations Controller
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE & VISION



We are a growing property management company (Dream Cabin Getaways) managing luxury short-term rentals in the Tennessee Smoky Mountains and a long-term portfolio in Minnesota. We are moving from a "startup" phase into a professionalized "Operations" phase.

We aren't looking for a task-taker; we are looking for a Controller—someone who thinks like an owner, protects our cash flow, and ensures our systems remain airtight as we scale.



POSITION OVERVIEW

Salary Range: $525 – $785 USD / Month. 20 hours/ week ($6.00 – $9.00/hr for 20 hours/week).

Hours: 20 hours per week (Target: 9:00 AM – 1:00 PM US Eastern Time).



WHY JOIN DREAM CABIN GETAWAYS?

Growth-Minded & Solutions-Focused: We don’t dwell on problems; we find solutions. We want people who are hungry to learn, grow, and improve our systems every day.



Positive Energy: Property management sometimes involves surprise challenges. Pipes burst, tenants stop paying. It is critical that we approach our work with a positive attitude. We value collaboration, open communication, and a "can-do" spirit.

A Relationship, Not a Transaction: We want a years-long partnership where you feel supported, trusted, and empowered to make decisions.



Impact Over Activity: We value outcomes. You won't be micromanaged; you will be given clear goals and the freedom to execute, along with the support to be able to succeed.







YOUR WEEKLY FOCUS

10?counting & Trust Management: You handle complex deposit reconciliations (OwnerRez/Airbnb/Vrbo) into REIhub and generate professional Monthly Owner Statements for our PM clients.



60% Operations & Loop-Closing: You own maintenance from "Reported" to "Invoiced". You enforce the 24-Hour No-Update Rule, providing proactive status updates on all open projects in 
 without being prompted.



20% Financial Administration: You audit and pay contractor invoices, ensuring billed hours match agreements. You manage purchasing for cabin supplies to keep our "jewel properties" guest-ready.



10% High-Level Support: You provide expert backup for our STR Manager (Jeneff) during her time off.



Required Experience & Technical Skills

Experience: 3+ years in US-based Property Management is required. You must understand the "rhythm" and details of property management—from lease renewals to emergency repairs. Short term and long-term experience a plus.



Financial Rigor: Proven experience with Accounting for Real Estate including Short Term Rentals. 



The Tech Stack: While we use OwnerRez, REIhub, and 
, we value your PM and Accounting Experience over your specific software experience. If you are an expert in the industry, and familiar with competitor tools, we can train you on our specific stack.



Assertiveness: You are comfortable "chasing" contractors and tenants with a smile, and holding vendors accountable to their bids.



HOW TO APPLY

To verify your attention to detail and financial expertise, please follow these steps exactly:



Subject Line: Include the name of the original bass player for the Grateful Dead.



Cover Letter (Paragraph 3): Include the phrase "closing the loop."



The Initiative Test: Describe a specific time you solved a contractor or tenant problem without waiting for direction.



The Financial Filter: Briefly describe your past accounting/bookkeeping work. Specifically:



Which software have you used (REIhub, QBO, Xero)?

Have you ever managed Trust Accounting or Owner Statements?

In 2-3 sentences, how do you handle a situation where an Airbnb payout doesn't match the expected booking amount in your PMS (like OwnerRez)?

title: Hiring: Remote VA Dispatcher + Social Media & Content Manager (Full-Time)
description:
Hiring: Remote VA Dispatcher + Social Media & Content Manager (Full-Time)



We’re hiring for a combined role:

Dispatcher / VA (lead handling, customer follow-ups, scheduling, coordination) plus

Social Media + Content + Graphics (daily content management and creative execution).



Requirements (Must-Have)

 • 2.5+ years of real, hands-on experience managing social media and content daily

Not occasional posting, not small edits, and not AI-only content.

 • Strong understanding of Meta Ads (Business Manager, campaigns, creatives, basic performance tracking)

 • Strong editing + graphic design skills (professional content that converts)

 • Highly independent: we provide direction and standards — you execute without training

 • Creative, organized, open to feedback, fast with revisions



Schedule

 • 10 hours/day

 • 6 days/week

 • 4 weeks/month



Pay

 • First 1–2 months: $350/month (trial + onboarding)

 • After that: growth based on performance to $400–$900/month

In the future, strong consistent performance may also qualify for a schedule reduction from 10 hours to 8 hours/day (same pay, fewer hours).



Equipment (Non-Negotiable)

 • Stable internet + backup internet

 • At least two monitors

 • Reliable, quiet workspace



How to Apply (Required)

 1. Start your message with: “I read the full post”

 2. Send a short video where you:



 • Introduce yourself and why we should choose you

 • List your specific tools + experience (social, editing, design, Meta Ads)

 • Show your computer setup and monitors

 • Run and show a live speed test

 • Show your internet backup and your power backup/outage solution



 3. Complete this mini-task (15–20 min):  (this is not required but a big bonus)



 • Create 1
 post + 1 Instagram story for a chimney/air duct service business

 • Include: hook, caption, CTA, and a simple creative mockup (Canva/PSD)

 • Add 3 bullets explaining your targeting/creative angle



Applicants who don’t follow the steps above will not move forward.

title: Administrative Secretary
description:
About Us



We are a fast-growing, Canada-based education services company dedicated to supporting international students across North America. Our core service focuses on assisting students with academic petitions and navigating complex university systems with clarity and confidence.



As our client base continues to expand, we are building a strong, global support team and actively seeking talented professionals in the Philippines to grow with us. We value professionalism, efficiency, and a high standard of service in everything we do.



At our company, we believe in long-term collaboration. We provide meaningful opportunities for tea
mbers to develop their skills, take on greater responsibilities, and grow within the organization. We recognize and reward performance — employees who demonstrate a strong work ethic, reliability, and measurable contribution will have opportunities for pay increases and advancement over time.



Our goal is not simply to hire assistants, but to build a committed team where individuals can thrive, improve professionally, and grow alongside a rapidly expanding organization.



Key Responsibilities

1. Daily Administrative & Management Support



Draft and manage daily
 communication on behalf of the company



Assist in preparing and revising basic academic petition letters and written statements



Support routine administrative coordination with students



Assist students with registering for school-related activities or appointments



Help manage daily workflows and solve minor operational issues independently



Provide general administrative support to ensure smooth daily operations



2. Document & File Management

Extract, and archive content for administrative use



Ensure document accuracy, consistency, and proper formatting



Support internal document tracking and basic data organization



Core Skills & Qualifications (Required)



- English proficiency at C1 level or above (strong writing and reading skills are essential)



- Highly detail-oriented with strong proofreading ability



- Comfortable drafting professional
s and structured written documents



- Familiarity with AI tools such as ChatGPT



- Strong problem-solving ability and independent work style



- Age under 30



- Fast and stable internet connection



- Ability to work during North America hours (12 AM – 8 PM GMT-5)



- Proficient with Google Docs, Google Drive, and Excel

title: SUCCESS MANAGER
description:
This is not a VA job. This is the engine room role. You earn $100 every time any rep on the team closes a deal, because you made sure the machine that produced that deal was working correctly. As the team scales, your override income scales with it. You also earn a small residual for every client that stays on the monthly care plan, which means your income compounds as long as you keep the team performing and clients retained.



What You'll Be Doing

You are the operating layer between the sales team and the founder. The founder should not be dealing with day-to-day rep questions, call quality issues, or CRM hygiene problems. That's your job. You start every morning by checking that the calendar has open slots, leads are loaded, and yesterday's calls are logged. Then you pull call recordings and audit them, 10 per setter, 5 per closer, every day.



You enforce the rules: no disposition logged means no commission, and you are the one who holds that line. You post the weekly scoreboard every Friday. You run the one-hour Sales System Review each week with the team. You approve or reject the weekly lead list. You own the pipeline, if a deal is stuck or a stage is wrong, you catch it within 24 hours.



You do not source leads. You do not build automations. You do not do client installs. You do not close deals. Your job is to make sure the people doing those things are doing them correctly, and to catch problems before they reach the founder.



Hard Disqualifiers

If you have never managed or supervised a team, this role is not for you yet. If you would not be comfortable telling a rep their commission is held because they didn't log their calls, this role is not for you. If you need someone to check your work daily, this role is not for you. This position requires someone who runs toward problems, not away from them. The Loom question about the underperforming setter is the actual interview. Answer it well and you're most of the way there.



How to Apply

01

Record a 90-second Loom. Tell us your name and your experience managing or supervising a sales or operations team. Then answer this question live on camera: "A setter on your team has missed their dial minimum for two days in a row. What do you do?" How you answer tells us more than your resume.

02

Send your Loom link with your application. No Loom = no review. No exceptions for any reason.

03

If your Loom passes, you'll receive the full team playbook to review and a short written scenario test within 48 hours. Pass the test and the role is yours.

title: Global Virtual Assistant
description:

This role is responsible for managing schedules, coordinating team workflows, supporting meetings and events, and ensuring day-to-day administrative functions run smoothly. The ideal candidate is organized, proactive, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple priorities in a professional environment.



This position is 100% remote.



ABOUT CARDONE VENTURES

Our mission is to help business owners achieve their personal, professional, and financial goals through the growth of their businesses. We work in dozens of verticals and provide strategic business guidance through courses, live events, partnerships, and investments. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are inspirational, accountable, transparent, disciplined, aligned, and results-oriented. This company operates nationally and is growing by the day.

COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITY

We hire local talent at all levels regardless of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability, and actively foster inclusion in all forms both within our company and across interactions with clients, candidates, and partners.

title: HIRING ASAP: Executive Assistant [Long-Term Role]
description:
Who We Are (Infinity Clients)



Infinity Clients builds predictable client acquisition systems for aesthetic clinics and medical spas across the UK, US, and Canada. We don’t chase vanity metrics — we build systems that drive revenue, profit, and long-term stability for our partners.

s, forms, folder setup, status updates)
